    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends

   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the

   271                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.

   494                                  ; Relocate
   495                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ; NOTES:
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   500                                  ;
   501                                  ; INPUT:     none
   502                                  ;
   503                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   504                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   505                                  ;
   506                                  ; calls:     none
   507                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   508                                  ;
   509                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   510                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   511                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   512                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   513                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   514                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   515                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   518                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   521                                  ;
   522                                  ; jump to relocated code
   523                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   524                                  
   525                                  		; 14/09/2023

   648                                  ; FindClusterSize
   649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   650                                  ;
   651                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   652                                  ;

   654                                  ;

   693                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   694                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   695                                  ;
   696                                  ; INPUT:
   697                                  ;
   698                                  ; OUTPUT:
   699                                  ;

   701                                  ;   all other registers destroyed

   705                                  CalcFatSize:
   706                                  		; 14/09/2023

   715                                  		;;;

   765                                  
   766                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   768                                  ;
   769                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   770                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   771                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   772                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   773                                  ;
   774                                  ; INPUT:
   775                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   776                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   777                                  ;
   778                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   779                                  ;   ClusterSize
   780                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   781                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   782                                  ;
   783                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   784                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   785                                  ;
   786                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   787                                  ; logic:
   788                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   789                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   790                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   791                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   792                                  ;	read in so far.
   793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   794                                  
   795                                  ; 09/12/2022
   796                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   797                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   798                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   799                                  	
   800                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   801                                  		; 24/12/2022
   802                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   803                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   804                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   805                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   806                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2

   818                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]

   820                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster
   821                                  		; 06/10/2023

   823                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   824                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   825                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster
   826

   831

   834                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   835 00000160 743E                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster
   836                                  ; 06/10/2023
   837                                  %if 0
   838                                  		; 06/10/2023
   839                                  		;xor	ah, ah
   840                                  		;push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   841                                  					; already read in

   844                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorL] ;	Put starting sector of disk data
   845                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   846                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   847                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx
   848                                  		mul	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]
   849                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   850                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   851                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   852                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   853                                  		dec	ax
   854                                  		dec	ax

   861                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster

   867                                  		add	di, ax

   869                                  		mov	es, ax		; ES = segment 0
   870                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   871                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster
   872                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax
   873                                  		call	ReadSectors
   874                                  		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   875                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   876                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   976                                  SetNextClusterNum:

   983                                  		
   984                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   986                                  ;
   987                                  ; NOTES:
   988                                  ;
   989                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   990                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   991                                  ;
   992                                  ; INPUT:
   993                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   994                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   995                                  ;
   996                                  ; OUTPUT:
   997                                  ;	ES = 70h
   998                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
   999                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1000                                  ;
  1001                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1002                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1003                                  ;
  1004                                  ; calls:     none
  1005                                  ;
  1006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1007                                  ;
  1008                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1009                                  ;
  1010                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1011                                  ;
  1012                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1013                                  ;
  1014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1015                                  
  1016                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1017                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1018                                  		;push	ds
  1019                                  		
  1020                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1021                                  		; ds = cs
  1022                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters
  1023 000001A6 F726[0400]              		mul	word [ClusterSize]
  1024                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1025                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1026                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1027                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1028                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1029                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1030                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1031                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1032 000001AA 1E                      		push	ds
  1033                                  
  1034                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)
  1035                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1037 000001AE 29F0                    		sub	ax, si
  1038 000001B0 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  1039

  1051                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di
  1052                                  		;;mov	[cs:NextBioLocation], di
  1053                                  
  1054                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1055                                  
  1056 000001B8 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1057                                  
  1058                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1060                                  ;
  1061                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1062                                  ;
  1063                                  ;
  1064                                  ; INPUT:
  1065                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1066                                  ;   CS:
  1067                                  ;
  1068                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1069                                  ;
  1070                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1071                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1072                                  ;
  1073                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1078                                  ;
  1079                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1082                                  ;
  1083                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1084                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1085                                  ;
  1086                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;	 if (nc returned)
  1089                                  ;
  1090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1091                                  
  1092                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1093                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1094                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h
  1095                                  
  1096                                  GetContigClusters:
  1097                                  
  1098                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1099                                  %if 0	
  1100                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1101                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1102                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1103                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1104                                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1105                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1106                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1107                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1108                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1109                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1110                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1111                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1112                                  		dec	ax
  1113                                  		dec	ax
  1114                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1115                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1116                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1117                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1118                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1119                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1120                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1121                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1122                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1123                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1124                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1125                                  		mov	es, ax
  1126                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1127                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1128                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1129                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1130                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1131                                  %endif
  1132                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1133                                  		; ds = cs
  1134 000001B9 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1135 000001BC A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1136                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]
  1137 000001BF 50                      		push	ax
  1138 000001C0 E8D400                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1139 000001C3 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]
  1140 000001C7 A3[0E00]                		mov	[CurrentCluster], ax	; Update the last one found
  1141                                  
  1142 000001CA 803E[2900]FF            		cmp	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh	; END_OF_FILE
  1143 000001CF 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022
  1144                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1145                                  		;xor	dx, dx ; * (not required)

  1148 000001D1 48                      		dec	ax
  1149 000001D2 48                      		dec	ax

  1152                                  		;mov	cx, [SecPerCluster]

  1154 000001D3 F726[1200]              		mul	word [SecPerCluster]
  1155 000001D7 0306[2200]              		add	ax, [FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1156 000001DB 1316[2400]              		adc	dx, [FirstSectorH]
  1157 000001DF A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax		; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1158 000001E2 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx
  1159                                  
  1160                                  		; es:di = (current) buffer address for (current) read
  1161                                  	
  1162 000001E6 E81600                  		call	ReadSectors
  1163                                  				; ES:DI = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1164                                  		
  1165 000001E9 EBCE                    		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1166                                  
  1167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1168                                  
  1169                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1170                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1171                                  ;
  1172                                  ; NOTES:
  1173                                  ;
  1174                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1175                                  ;
  1176                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1177                                  ;
  1178                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1179                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1180                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1181                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1182                                  ;
  1183                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1184                                  ;
  1185                                  ;   required by msinit
  1186                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1187                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1188                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1189                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1190                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1191                                  ;
  1192                                  ; calls:     none
  1193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1194                                  ;
  1195                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1196                                  ;
  1197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1198                                  
  1199                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1200                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1201                                  		; ds = cs	
  1202                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1203                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1204                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1205                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1206                                  
  1207 000001EB 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1208 000001EF 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1209 000001F3 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1210 000001F7 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1211                                  
  1212                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1213                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1214                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1215                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1216                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1217                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1218                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1219                                  		;
  1220                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1221                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1222                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1223                                  		;
  1224                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1225                                  
  1226 000001FA EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1227                                  
  1228                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1229                                  
  1230                                  ; ReadSectors
  1231                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1232                                  ; notES:
  1233                                  ;
  1234                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1235                                  ;
  1236                                  ;
  1237                                  ; INPUT:
  1238                                  ;
  1239                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1240                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1241                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1242                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1243                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1244                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1245                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1246                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1247                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1248                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1249                                  ;
  1250                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1251                                  ;
  1252                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1254                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1255                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1256                                  ;
  1257                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1258                                  ;
  1259                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1260                                  ;
  1261                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1262                                  ;
  1263                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1264                                  ;
  1265                                  ; do the read
  1266                                  ;
  1267                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1268                                  ;
  1269                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1270                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1271                                  ;
  1272                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1273                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1274                                  
  1275                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1276                                  ReadSectors:
  1277                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1278                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1279                                  ReadSectors:
  1280 000001FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1281                                  
  1282                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1283                                  		; logical sector number
  1284                                  TryRead:
  1285                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1286                                  		; ds = cs
  1287 00000202 51                      		push	cx
  1288                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1289                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1290                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1291                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1292                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1293                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1294                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1295 00000203 A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1296 00000206 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1297                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1298                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1299                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1300 00000208 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1301 0000020C F7F3                    		div	bx
  1302                                  
  1303                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1304                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1305                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1306 0000020E 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1307                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1308 00000210 A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1309 00000213 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1310                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1311                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1312                                  						; dx = sector number
  1313                                  
  1314                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1315                                  						; read in this track
  1316 00000215 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1317                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1318 00000217 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1319                                  
  1320 0000021B 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1321 0000021D 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1322                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1323                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1324                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1325 0000021F 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1326                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1327                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1328                                  ;GotLength:
  1329                                  
  1330                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1331                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1332                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1333                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1334                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1335                                  %if 0
  1336                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1337                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1338                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1339                                  		or	di, di
  1340                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1341                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1342                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1343                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1344                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1345                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1346                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1347                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1348                                  		push	dx
  1349                                  		push	ax
  1350                                  		mov	ax, si
  1351                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1352                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1353                                  		mov	bx, es
  1354                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1355                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1356                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1357                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1358                                  		pop	ax
  1359                                  		pop	dx
  1360                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1361                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1362                                  		
  1363                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1364                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1365                                  		dec	si
  1366                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1367                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1368                                  %endif
  1369                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1370                                  GotLength:
  1371                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1372                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1373 00000221 42                      		inc	dx
  1374 00000222 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1375                                  		
  1376                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1377                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1378                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1379                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1380                                  		
  1381 00000224 50                      		push	ax
  1382                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1383                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1384 00000225 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1385 00000227 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1386                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1387 00000229 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1388                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1389                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1390                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1391 0000022D 58                      		pop	ax
  1392 0000022E F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1393                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1394                                  
  1395                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1396                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1397                                  
  1398 00000232 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1399                                  		
  1400 00000234 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1401 00000236 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1402 00000238 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1403 0000023A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1404 0000023C 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1405 0000023E 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1406                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1407 00000240 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1408                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1409 00000244 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1410 00000246 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1411                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1412                                  		;push	ax
  1413                                  		;push	di
  1414                                  
  1415                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1416                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1417                                  
  1418 00000248 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  1419                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  1420                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  1421                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  1422                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1423                                  		;pop	di
  1424                                  		;pop	ax
  1425                                  
  1426                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1427 0000024A B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  1428                                  		
  1429 0000024C 59                      		pop	cx		; Get retry count back
  1430 0000024D 7307                    		jnc	short ReadOk	; 23/12/2022
  1431                                  		
  1432                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1433                                  		;mov	bx, di		; Get offset
  1434                                  		; ah = 0

  1445                                  		; 23/12/2022

  1449 00000252 741B                    		jz	short ReadError

  1472                                  		;mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]

  1474                                  
  1475                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1476                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1477                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address

  1497 00000268 8316[0800]00            		adc	word [StartSecH], 0
  1498                                  		;adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0
  1499 0000026D EB90                    		jmp	ReadSectors
  1500                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1501                                  
  1502                                  ReadError:
  1503                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1504                                  ErrorOut:
  1505                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1506                                  		; ds = cs
  1507                                  		;push	cs
  1508                                  		;pop	ds
  1509                                  		
  1510 0000026F BE[3803]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1511 00000272 E81500                  		call	WriteTTY
  1512                                  
  1513                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1514                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1515                                  
  1516 00000275 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1517 00000277 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1518                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1519                                  
  1520                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1521                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1522                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1523                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1524                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1525                                  		; loader bios interrupt.

  1532 00000279 C41E[2A00]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1533

  1536 0000027D 16                      		push	ss ; 0
  1537 0000027E 1F                      		pop	ds
  1538                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1540                                  		;mov	ds, si
  1541                                  		; ds = 0

  1545 00000284 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1546                                  
  1547 00000287 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot

  1589                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1590                                  
  1591                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1593                                  ;
  1594                                  ; NOTES:
  1595                                  ;
  1596                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1597                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1598                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1599                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1600                                  ;
  1601                                  ; INPUT:
  1602                                  ;
  1603                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1604                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1605                                  ;
  1606                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1607                                  ;
  1608                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1609                                  ;
  1610                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1612                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1613                                  ;
  1614                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1615                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1616                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1617                                  ;     else
  1618                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1619                                  ;
  1620                                  ; else
  1621                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1622                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1623                                  ;     else
  1624                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1625                                  ;
  1626                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1627                                  ;
  1628                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1629                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1630                                  ;
  1631                                  ;	 else
  1632                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1633                                  ;	}
  1634                                  ;    }
  1635                                  ;
  1636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1637                                  
  1638                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1639                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1640                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1641                                  
  1642                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1643 00000297 06                      		push	es
  1644                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1645                                  		; ds = cs
  1646                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1647 00000298 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1648 0000029B 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1649                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1650                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1651                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1652                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1653                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1654                                  		; ds = cs
  1655 0000029D C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1656 000002A2 A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1657                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1658 000002A5 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1659                                  		; dx = 0
  1660 000002A7 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1661                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1662                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1663 000002AC 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1664                                  Got12Bit:
  1665 000002AE 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1666 000002B0 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1667 000002B2 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1668                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1669 000002B4 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1670                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1671                                  		;push	dx
  1672                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1673                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1674                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1675 000002B5 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1676                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1677 000002B8 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1678                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1679                                  		;pop	dx
  1680 000002B9 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1681 000002BB 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1682                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1683                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1684                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1685 000002BE 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1686 000002BF 46                      		inc	si
  1687                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1688                                  		;push	dx
  1689 000002C0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1690 000002C2 E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1691                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1692                                  		;pop	dx
  1693                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1694                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1695                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1696                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1697                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1698                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1699 000002C5 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1700 000002C6 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1701 000002CB EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1702                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1703                                  
  1704                                  ClusterOk:				
  1705 000002CD 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1706                                  EvenOdd:	
  1707                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1708                                  		; ds = cs
  1709 000002D0 F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1710                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1711                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1712                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1713 000002D5 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1714 000002D7 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1715 000002DA EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1716                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1717                                  
  1718                                  OddResult:				
  1719 000002DC B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1720 000002DE D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1721                                  TestEOF:				
  1722 000002E0 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1723 000002E3 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1724 000002E5 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1726                                  
  1727                                  Got16Bit:
  1728                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1729                                  		;push	dx
  1730                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1731                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1732                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1733                                  		; dx = 0
  1734                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1735 000002E7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1736                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1737                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1738 000002E9 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; 0
  1739 000002EB 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1740 000002ED E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1741                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1742                                  		;pop	dx
  1743 000002F0 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1744 000002F3 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1745 000002F6 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1746                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1747                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1748                                  		; ds = cs			
  1749                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1750                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1751 000002F8 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1752                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1753 000002FD 07                      		pop	es
  1754                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1755                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1756                                  ;EndRead:
  1757 000002FE C3                      		retn
  1758                                  
  1759                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1760                                  
  1761                                  ; GetFatSector
  1762                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1763                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1764                                  ;
  1765                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1766                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1767                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1768                                  ;
  1769                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1770                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1771                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1772                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1773                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1774                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1775                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1776                                  ;
  1777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1778                                  
  1779                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1780                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1781                                  GetFatSector:
  1782                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1783                                  		;push	ax
  1784                                  		;push	si
  1785 000002FF 57                      		push	di
  1786 00000300 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1787                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1788                                  		; ds = cs
  1789                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1790                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1791 00000302 F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1792 00000306 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1793                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1794 0000030A 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1795 0000030C A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1796                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1797 0000030F 52                      		push	dx
  1798                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1799 00000310 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1800                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1801                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1802                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1803                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1804                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1805                                  		; ds = cs
  1806 00000312 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1807 00000316 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1808 0000031A A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1809 0000031D 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1810                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1811                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1812                                  		
  1813 00000321 C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1814                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1815 00000327 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1816                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1817 00000329 E8D3FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1818 0000032C 5A                      		pop	dx
  1819                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1820                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1821                                  SplitChk:
  1822                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1823 0000032D 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1824 00000331 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1825 00000332 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1826 00000334 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1827 00000336 5F                      		pop	di
  1828                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1829                                  		;pop	si
  1830                                  		;pop	ax
  1831                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1832                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1833 00000337 C3                      		retn
  1834                                  
  1835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1836                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1837                                  
  1838                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1839                                  ;include msbio.cl1
  1840                                  
  1841                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1842                                  		; 20/12/2022
  1843                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1844                                  		;db 0	; (word alignment)
  1845                                  NonSystemDiskMsg:
  1846 00000338 0D0A                    		db 0Dh,0Ah		; ...
  1847 0000033A 4E6F6E2D5379737465-     		db 'Non-System disk or disk error',0Dh,0Ah
  1847 00000343 6D206469736B206F72-
  1847 0000034C 206469736B20657272-
  1847 00000355 6F720D0A           
  1848 00000359 5265706C6163652061-     		db 'Replace and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah,0
  1848 00000362 6E6420707265737320-
  1848 0000036B 616E79206B65792077-
  1848 00000374 68656E207265616479-
  1848 0000037D 0D0A00             
  1849                                  ; 25/12/2022

  1851

  1853                                  
  1854                                  number0div	equ ($-START$)
  1855                                  number0mod	equ (number0div % 16)
  1856                                  
  1857                                  %if (number0mod>0) & (number0mod<16)
  1858                                  		times (16-number0mod) db 0
  1859                                  %endif

  1863                                  ; 07/10/2023

  1866                                  ;=============================================================================
  1867                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) DATA SEGMENT 
  1868                                  ;=============================================================================
  1869                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  1870                                  
  1871                                  section .BIOSDATA vstart=0
  1872                                  
  1873                                  ;--- DOSBIOS data segment ----------------------------------------------------
  1874                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1875                                  
  1876                                  ;Bios_Data segment
  1877                                  
  1878                                  BData_start:				
  1879 00000000 E96F17                  hdrv_pat:	jmp	init		; MSBIO1.ASM, MSSBDATA.INC
  1880                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1881                                  
  1882 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0
  1883                                  
  1884                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1885                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f
  1886                                  			
  1887 00000005 EA                      bios_i2f:	db 0EAh			; far jump to int_2f (segment may not be at 70h)
  1888 00000006 [9108]                  off_706:	dw int_2f
  1889 00000008 7000                    word_708:	dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1890                                  
  1891 0000000A 0000                    romstartaddr:	dw 0			; The start address for the romfind routines
  1892                                  					; This is to maintain binary compatibility
  1893                                  					; with DISK based DOS 5.0
  1894                                  
  1895                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident
  1896                                  ; console device driver. It must be here so that it can be included
  1897                                  ; in the WIN386 instance table (in INC\LMSTUB.ASM).
  1898                                  
  1899 0000000C 00                      altah:		db 0			; special key handling
  1900

  2045 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2046 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2047                                  
  2048                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2049                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2050                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2051                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2052                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2053                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2054                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2055                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2056                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2057                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2058                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2059                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2060                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2061                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2062                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2063                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2064                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2065                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2066                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2067                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2068                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2069                                  
  2070 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2071 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2072 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2073                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2074 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2075 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2076 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2077 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2078 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2079                                  
  2080                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2081                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2082                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2083                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2084                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2085                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2086                                  ;
  2087                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2088                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2089                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2090                                  ;   else
  2091                                  ;	set slow = value
  2092                                  ;   ...
  2093                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2094                                  ;	use slow
  2095                                  ;   else
  2096                                  ;	use fast
  2097                                  ;   ...
  2098                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2099                                  
  2100 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2101 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2102 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2103 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2104 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2105 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2106 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2107 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2108 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2109 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2110 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2111 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2112 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format

  2526                                  ;*									*
  2527                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2528                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2529                                  ;*									*

  2534                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call

  2540                                  ;************************************************************************
  2541                                  ;*									*
  2542                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2543                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2544                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2545                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2546                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2547                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2548                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2549                                  ;*									*
  2550                                  ;************************************************************************
  2551                                  
  2552                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2553                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2554                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)

  2556                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2557

  2660                                  ;************************************************************************
  2661                                  ;*									*
  2662                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2663                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2664                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2665                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2666                                  ;*									*
  2667                                  ;************************************************************************
  2668                                  
  2669                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2670 00000743 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2671 00000749 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2672                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2673 0000074B 50                      		push	ax
  2674 0000074C 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2675 00000750 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2676 00000755 58                      		pop	ax
  2677 00000756 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2678                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2679                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2680                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2681 00000758 2EFF2E[DE06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2682                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2683                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2684                                  
  2685                                  not_from_dos:				
  2686 0000075D E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2687 00000760 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2688                                  
  2689                                  ;************************************************************************
  2690                                  ;*									*
  2691                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2692                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2693                                  ;*									*
  2694                                  ;************************************************************************
  2695                                  
  2696                                  outchr:					
  2697 00000762 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2698 00000763 56                      		push	si
  2699 00000764 57                      		push	di
  2700 00000765 55                      		push	bp
  2701 00000766 53                      		push	bx
  2702 00000767 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2703 00000769 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2704 0000076C CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2705                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2706                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2707 0000076E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2708 0000076F 5D                      		pop	bp
  2709 00000770 5F                      		pop	di
  2710 00000771 5E                      		pop	si
  2711 00000772 58                      		pop	ax
  2712 00000773 CF                      		iret
