  2714                                  
  2715                                  ;************************************************************************
  2716                                  ;*									*
  2717                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2718                                  ;*									*
  2719                                  ;************************************************************************
  2720                                  
  2721                                  block13:				
  2722 00000774 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2723 0000077A 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2724 0000077C E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2725 0000077F 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2726 00000781 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2727                                  
  2728                                  skipa20:				
  2729 00000784 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2730 00000789 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2731 0000078A 2EFF1E[EA06]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2732                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2733                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2734 0000078F 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2735 00000794 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2736                                  
  2737                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2738                                  
  2739                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2740                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2741                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2742                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2743                                  
  2744                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2745 00000797 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2746 0000079B 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2747 0000079C 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2748                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2749 000007A1 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2750 000007A6 0E                      		push	cs
  2751 000007A7 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2752                                  
  2753 000007A8 9C                      		pushf
  2754                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2755                                  		; ds = cs
  2756 000007A9 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2757                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2758 000007AE 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2759 000007B0 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2760 000007B3 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2761 000007B5 E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2762                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2763 000007B8 9D                      		popf
  2764 000007B9 CB                      		retf

  2817 000007DD 2EC43E[BE07]            		les	di, [cs:LoMem]

  2819 000007E5 F3A7                    		repe cmpsw

  2839                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  2841                                  ;************************************************************************
  2842                                  ;*									*
  2843                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2844                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2845                                  ;*									*
  2846                                  ;************************************************************************
  2847                                  
  2848                                  int19:					
  2849 000007F9 0E                      		push	cs
  2850 000007FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2851 000007FB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022
  2852 000007FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  2853                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2854 00000802 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2855                                  next_int:				
  2856 00000805 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2857 00000806 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2858 00000807 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2859 00000809 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2860 0000080B 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2861 0000080D AD                      		lodsw
  2862 0000080E AB                      		stosw
  2863 0000080F AD                      		lodsw
  2864 00000810 AB                      		stosw			; install the saved vector
  2865 00000811 E2F2                    		loop	next_int
  2866 00000813 803E[4006]00            		cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  2867 00000818 7422                    		jz	short doint19
  2868 0000081A BE[4106]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2869                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2870 0000081D B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2871                                  
  2872                                  i19_restore_loop:			
  2873 00000820 AC                      		lodsb			; get interrupt	number
  2874 00000821 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2875 00000822 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2876 00000824 AD                      		lodsw			; get original vector offset
  2877 00000825 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2878 00000827 AD                      		lodsw
  2879 00000828 83FBFF                  		cmp	bx, 0FFFFh	; check	for 0ffffh (unlikely segment)
  2880 0000082B 740D                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too
  2881 0000082D 83F8FF                  		cmp	ax, 0FFFFh	; opt 0ffffh is	unlikely offset
  2882 00000830 7408                    		jz	short i19_restor_1
  2883 00000832 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2884 00000834 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2885 00000836 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2886 00000837 AB                      		stosw
  2887 00000838 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2888 00000839 AB                      		stosw			; put the vector back
  2889                                  
  2890                                  i19_restor_1:				
  2891 0000083A E2E4                    		loop	i19_restore_loop
  2892                                  
  2893                                  doint19:				
  2894 0000083C 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; ; Is dos running from	HMA
  2895 00000841 7403                    		jz	short SkipVDisk
  2896 00000843 E83000                  		call	EraseVDiskHead	; Then erase our VDISK header at 1MB boundary
  2897                                  					; Some m/c's (AST 386 & HP QS/16 do not clear
  2898                                  					; the memory above 1MB during a	warm boot.
  2899                                  SkipVDisk:

  2901                                  					; causes reboot	of disk	system

  2907                                  ; procedure : int15
  2908                                  ;
  2909                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2910                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2911                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2912                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2913                                  ;
  2914                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2915                                  
  2916                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2917                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2918                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2919                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2920                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2921                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2922                                  
  2923                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2924                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2925 00000848 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2926 0000084B 7405                    		jz	short int15_1
  2927 0000084D 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2928                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2929                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2930                                  
  2931                                  int15_1:				
  2932 00000852 1E                      		push	ds
  2933 00000853 50                      		push	ax
  2934 00000854 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2935 00000857 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2936                                  		;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2937                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2938 00000859 A01700                  		mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2939 0000085C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2940 0000085E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2941 00000860 750C                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2942 00000862 0E                      		push	cs
  2943 00000863 1F                      		pop	ds
  2944 00000864 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2945 00000869 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2946 0000086B E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2947                                  int15_2:				
  2948 0000086E 58                      		pop	ax
  2949 0000086F 1F                      		pop	ds
  2950 00000870 F9                      		stc
  2951 00000871 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2952                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2953

  2961                                  ;

  2964                                  EraseVDiskHead:	; proc near		
  2965 00000876 50                      		push	ax

  2971 00000880 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax

  2973 00000885 B91000                  		mov	cx, 10h		; size of vdisk	header
  2974 00000888 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  2975 0000088A F3AB                    		rep stosw		; clear	it
  2976 0000088C 07                      		pop	es
  2977 0000088D 5F                      		pop	di

  2979 0000088F 58                      		pop	ax

  3025                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3026                                  
  3027                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3028                                  ;
  3029                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3030                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3031                                  
  3032 0000089A 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3033                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3034 0000089C 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3035 000008A0 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3036 000008A4 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3037 000008A8 [AC08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3038 000008AA 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3039                                  
  3040                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3041                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3042                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3043                                  
  3044 000008AC 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3045 000008B0 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3046 000008B2 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3047 000008B6 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3048 000008B8 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3049 000008BA 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3050 000008BC 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3051                                  
  3052                                  NextStack:
  3053                                  
  3054                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3055                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3056                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3057                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3058                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3059                                  
  3060 000008BE 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3061 000008C2 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3062 000008C4 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3063 000008C8 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3064 000008CA 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3065                                  
  3066                                  					;SR;
  3067 000008CE 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3068                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3069                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3070                                  
  3071                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3072                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3073                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3074                                  
  3075                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3076 000008CF 57                      		push	di
  3077 000008D0 06                      		push	es
  3078 000008D1 53                      		push	bx
  3079 000008D2 50                      		push	ax
  3080 000008D3 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3081 000008D5 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3082 000008D7 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3083 000008DA B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3084 000008DD CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3085                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3086                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3087 000008DF 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3088 000008E1 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3089 000008E3 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3090                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3091 000008E5 0E                      		push	cs
  3092                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3093                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3094                                  		;push	ax
  3095                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3096 000008E6 68[EF08]                		push	Skip
  3097 000008E9 06                      		push	es
  3098 000008EA 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3099 000008EB B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3100 000008EE CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3101                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3102                                  
  3103                                  Skip:					
  3104 000008EF 58                      		pop	ax
  3105 000008F0 5B                      		pop	bx
  3106 000008F1 07                      		pop	es
  3107 000008F2 5F                      		pop	di
  3108 000008F3 CB                      		retf
  3109                                  
  3110                                  ;End WIN386 support

  3382                                  
  3383                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3384                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3385                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3386                                  
  3387                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3388                                  
  3389                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3390                                  ;
  3391                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3392                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3393                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3394                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3395                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3396                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3397                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3398                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3399                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3400                                  ;
  3401                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3402                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3403                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3404                                  ;
  3405                                  ;	uses:	
  3406                                  ;
  3407                                  ;
  3408                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3409                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3410                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3411                                  ;
  3412                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3413                                  
  3414                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3415                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3416                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3417                                  
  3418                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3419                                  
  3420                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3421                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3422                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3423                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3424                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3425                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3426                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3427                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3428                                  
  3429                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3430                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3431                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3432                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3433                                  
  3434                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3435 000012DB 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3436 000012DE 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3437 000012E0 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3438 000012E3 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3439 000012E5 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3440 000012E8 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3441                                  atd1:
  3442 000012EA 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3443                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3444                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3445                                  
  3446                                  atd2:					
  3447 000012EF 53                      		push	bx
  3448 000012F0 51                      		push	cx
  3449 000012F1 52                      		push	dx
  3450 000012F2 57                      		push	di
  3451 000012F3 1E                      		push	ds
  3452 000012F4 06                      		push	es
  3453 000012F5 50                      		push	ax
  3454 000012F6 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3455                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3456 000012F9 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3457                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3458 000012FB C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3459                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3460                                  					; initially no error code.
  3461 00001300 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3462 00001303 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3463                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3464 00001307 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3465                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3466 00001309 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3467 0000130E EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3468                                  					; return
  3469                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3470                                  
  3471                                  atd3:					
  3472 00001310 53                      		push	bx
  3473 00001311 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3474 00001313 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3475 00001316 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3476 00001318 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3477 0000131A 5B                      		pop	bx
  3478 0000131B 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3479 0000131E 0E                      		push	cs
  3480 0000131F E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3481 00001322 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3482 00001324 58                      		pop	ax
  3483 00001325 50                      		push	ax
  3484 00001326 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3485 00001329 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3486 0000132C EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3487 0000132D E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3488                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3489                                  
  3490                                  atd4:	
  3491                                  
  3492                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3493                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3494                                  				
  3495 00001330 58                      		pop	ax
  3496                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3497 00001331 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3498 00001335 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3499 00001337 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3500 00001339 F9                      		stc
  3501                                  atd5:					
  3502 0000133A 07                      		pop	es
  3503 0000133B 1F                      		pop	ds
  3504 0000133C 5F                      		pop	di
  3505 0000133D 5A                      		pop	dx
  3506 0000133E 59                      		pop	cx
  3507 0000133F 5B                      		pop	bx
  3508 00001340 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3509                                  
  3510                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3511                                  
  3512                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3513                                  ;
  3514                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3515                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3516                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3517                                  ;	
  3518                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3519                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3520                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3521                                  ;
  3522                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3523                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3524                                  ;
  3525                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3526                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3527                                  
  3528                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3529                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3530                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3531 00001343 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3532                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3533 00001346 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3534 0000134B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3535 0000134E 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3536 00001350 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3537                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3538                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3539                                  setc1:					
  3540 00001355 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3541 00001357 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3542                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3543                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3544 00001359 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3545 0000135C 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3546 00001360 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3547 00001362 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3548                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3549 00001365 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3550 00001368 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3551 0000136A C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3552 0000136D 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3553 00001370 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3554 00001372 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3555                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3556 00001374 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3557 00001377 06                      		push	es
  3558 00001378 53                      		push	bx
  3559 00001379 0E                      		push	cs
  3560 0000137A E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3561 0000137D 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3562                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3563 00001381 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3564                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3565 00001384 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3566                                  					; only use low part
  3567 00001387 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3568                                  					; control byte modifier
  3569 0000138B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3570 0000138C 07                      		pop	es
  3571                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3572 0000138D 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3573 00001391 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3574 00001394 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3575                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3576 00001396 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3577 0000139A C3                      		retn
  3578                                  
  3579                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3580                                  
  3581                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3582                                  ;
  3583                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3584                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3585                                  ;
  3586                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3587                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3588                                  ;
  3589                                  ;	
  3590                                  ;
  3591                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3592                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3593                                  ;
  3594                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3595                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3596                                  
  3597                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3598 0000139B 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3599 0000139D 0E                      		push	cs
  3600 0000139E E84000                  		call	command
  3601 000013A1 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3602                                  doc1:					
  3603 000013A3 0E                      		push	cs
  3604 000013A4 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3605 000013A7 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3606 000013A9 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3607 000013AC BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3608 000013AF FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3609 000013B0 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3610                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3611                                  
  3612                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3613                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3614                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3615                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3616                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3617                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3618                                  ;
  3619                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3620                                  
  3621                                  rsct_loop:				
  3622 000013B1 6D                      		insw
  3623 000013B2 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3624 000013B4 FB                      		sti
  3625                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3626 000013B5 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3627                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3628                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3629 000013BA 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3630 000013BC 0E                      		push	cs
  3631 000013BD E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3632 000013C0 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3633 000013C2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3634 000013C5 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3635 000013C8 FA                      		cli
  3636 000013C9 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3637 000013CB FB                      		sti
  3638                                  doc2:					
  3639 000013CC 0E                      		push	cs
  3640 000013CD E82900                  		call	check_status
  3641 000013D0 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3642                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3643 000013D2 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3644 000013D6 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3645                                  doc3:					
  3646 000013D8 C3                      		retn
  3647                                  
  3648                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3649                                  
  3650                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3651                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3652                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3653                                  
  3654                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3655                                  
  3656                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3657                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3658                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3659                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3660                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3661                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3662                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3663                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3664                                  
  3665                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3666                                  ;
  3667                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3668                                  ;
  3669                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3670                                  ;
  3671                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3672                                  ;
  3673                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3674                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3675                                  ;	
  3676                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3677                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3678                                  
  3679                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3680                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3681                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3682                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3683 000013D9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3684 000013DC EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3685                                  
  3686                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3687                                  
  3688                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3689                                  ;
  3690                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3691                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3692                                  ;
  3693                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3694                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3695                                  ;
  3696                                  ;
  3697                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3698                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3699                                  ;
  3700                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3701                                  
  3702                                  command:	; proc near		
  3703                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3704                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3705                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3706 000013E1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3707 000013E4 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3708                                  
  3709                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3710                                  
  3711                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3712                                  ;
  3713                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3714                                  ;
  3715                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3716                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3717                                  ;
  3718                                  ;
  3719                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3720                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3721                                  ;		
  3722                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3723                                  
  3724                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3725                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3726                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3727                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3728 000013E9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3729 000013EC EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3730                                  
  3731                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3732                                  
  3733                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3734                                  ;
  3735                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3736                                  ;
  3737                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3738                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3739                                  ;
  3740                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3741                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3742                                  
  3743                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3744                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3745                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3746                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3747 000013F1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3748 000013F4 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3749                                  
  3750                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3751                                  
  3752                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3753                                  ;
  3754                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3755                                  ;
  3756                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3757                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3758                                  ;
  3759                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3760                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3761                                  
  3762                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3763                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3764                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3765                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3766 000013F9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3767 000013FC EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3768                                  
  3769                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3770                                  
  3771                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3772                                  ;
  3773                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3774                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3775                                  ;
  3776                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3777                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3778                                  ;
  3779                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3780                                  
  3781                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3782                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3783                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3784                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3785 00001401 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3786 00001404 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3787                                  
  3788                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3789                                  
  3790                                  endatrom:
  3791                                  
  3792                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3793                                  
  3794                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3795                                  ;;
  3796                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3797                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3798                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3799                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3800                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3801                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3802                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3803                                  
  3804                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3805 00001409 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3806                                  					;
  3807                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3808                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3809                                  					;
  3810                                  					; warning!!!
  3811                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3812 0000140C 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3813                                  no_hookit:				
  3814                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3815                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3816 0000140E 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3817                                  
  3818                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3819                                  
  3820                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3821 00001413 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3822 00001416 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3823 00001418 1E                      		push	ds
  3824 00001419 50                      		push	ax
  3825 0000141A B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3826 0000141D 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3827 0000141F 58                      		pop	ax
  3828 00001420 9C                      		pushf
  3829                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3830                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3831 00001421 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3832 00001426 1F                      		pop	ds
  3833 00001427 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3834                                  
  3835                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3836                                  
  3837 0000142A 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3838                                  
  3839                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3840                                  
  3841                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3842                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3843                                  
  3844                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3845                                  
  3846                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3847                                  ;
  3848                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3849                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3850                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3851                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3852                                  
  3853                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3854 0000142B 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3855 00001430 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3856                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3857 00001437 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3858 00001439 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3859 0000143F 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3860 00001445 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3861                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3862                                  		
  3863                                  century20:				
  3864 00001447 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3865 0000144D 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3866 00001453 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3867                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3868                                  years:					
  3869 0000145A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3870 0000145C 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3871 00001460 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3872                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3873 00001463 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3874 00001465 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3875 0000146A B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3876 0000146C F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3877 0000146E 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3878 00001473 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3879 00001478 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3880 0000147F 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3881 00001481 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3882 00001486 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3883 0000148D B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3884                                  regularyear:				
  3885 00001490 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3886 00001497 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3887 00001499 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3888 0000149E 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3889 000014A5 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3890                                  					;
  3891                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3892                                  leapyear:				
  3893 000014A7 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3894                                  					; change month table.
  3895                                  yeardone:				
  3896 000014AD 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3897 000014AF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3898 000014B1 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3899                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3900 000014B5 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3901 000014B8 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3902                                  months:					
  3903 000014BB FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3904                                  
  3905                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3906                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3907                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3908                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3909                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3910                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3911                                  		
  3912 000014BD 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3913 000014BF 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3914                                  					; dh=0
  3915 000014C1 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3916 000014C3 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3917 000014C4 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3918 000014C6 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3919                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3920                                  month_done:				
  3921 000014C8 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3922                                  					; restore month table value
  3923 000014CE 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3924 000014D0 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3925 000014D5 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3926 000014DA 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3927                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3928                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3929 000014DF 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3930 000014E1 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3931                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3932 000014E6 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3933 000014E8 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3934                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3935 000014ED 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3936 000014EF 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3937                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3938 000014F4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3939 000014F6 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3940 000014FB CB                      		retf
  3941                                  
  3942                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3943                                  
  3944                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3945                                  
  3946                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3947                                  
  3948                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3949                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3950                                  		
  3951 000014FC 51                      		push	cx		
  3952 000014FD D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3953 000014FF B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3954 00001501 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3955 00001503 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3956 00001505 59                      		pop	cx
  3957 00001506 CB                      		retf
  3958                                  
  3959                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3960                                  
  3961                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3962                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3963                                  
  3964                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3965                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3966                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3967                                  
  3968                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3969                                  
  3970                                  int6c:					
  3971 00001507 0E                      		push	cs
  3972 00001508 1F                      		pop	ds
  3973 00001509 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3974 0000150D 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3975 00001511 9D                      		popf
  3976 00001512 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3977 00001515 FA                      		cli
  3978 00001516 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3979 0000151A FB                      		sti
  3980 0000151B E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3981 0000151E FA                      		cli
  3982 0000151F B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3983 00001521 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3984                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3985                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3986 00001523 FB                      		sti
  3987                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3988                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3989 00001524 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3990                                  
  3991                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3992                                  
  3993                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3994                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3995                                  
  3996                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3997 00001528 50                      		push	ax
  3998 00001529 51                      		push	cx
  3999 0000152A 52                      		push	dx
  4000 0000152B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4001 0000152D CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4002                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4003                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4004                                  					; midnight
  4005                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4006 0000152F 5A                      		pop	dx
  4007 00001530 59                      		pop	cx
  4008 00001531 58                      		pop	ax
  4009 00001532 50                      		push	ax
  4010 00001533 53                      		push	bx
  4011 00001534 51                      		push	cx
  4012 00001535 52                      		push	dx
  4013 00001536 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4014                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4015 0000153D B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4016 0000153F CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4017                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4018                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4019                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4020                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4021 00001541 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4022 00001543 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4023                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4024                                  
  4025                                  read_ok:				
  4026 00001546 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4027 0000154A 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4028 0000154E 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4029 00001552 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4030 00001556 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4031 0000155D E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4032 00001560 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  4033 00001562 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4034 00001569 E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  4035 0000156C 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4036 0000156E 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4037 00001575 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  4038 00001578 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4039 0000157B 98                      		cbw
  4040 0000157C 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4041 00001581 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4042 00001583 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4043                                  
  4044                                  century_19:				
  4045 00001586 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4046 00001589 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4047 0000158B F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4048 0000158D 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4049 0000158F 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4050 00001590 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4051                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4052 00001593 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4053 00001595 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4054 00001599 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4055 0000159B 98                      		cbw
  4056 0000159C 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4057 0000159E 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  4058 000015A0 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4059 000015A3 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4060 000015A5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4061 000015AA EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4062                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4063                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4064                                  
  4065                                  leap_year:				
  4066 000015AC 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4067 000015B1 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4068                                  leap_adjustment:			
  4069 000015B3 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4070                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4071 000015B8 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4072 000015BC 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4073 000015BE 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4074 000015BF 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4075 000015C4 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4076 000015C8 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4077 000015CA 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4078 000015CB D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4079 000015CD BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  4080 000015D0 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  4081                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4082                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4083                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4084                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4085                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4086 000015D2 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4087                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  4088 000015D4 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4089                                  r_d_ret:				
  4090 000015D9 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4091 000015DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  4092 000015DF 59                      		pop	cx
  4093 000015E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  4094 000015E1 58                      		pop	ax
  4095 000015E2 C3                      		retn
  4096                                  
  4097                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4098                                  
  4099                                  r_t_retj:				
  4100 000015E3 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4101 000015E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4102 000015E7 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4103                                  
  4104                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4105                                  
  4106                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4107                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4108                                  
  4109                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4110 000015E9 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4111 000015EB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4112                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4113                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4114                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4115 000015ED 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4116 000015EF 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4117 000015F3 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4118 000015F7 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4119 000015FB C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4120 00001600 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4121 00001603 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4122 00001605 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4123 00001608 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4124 0000160A E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4125 0000160D 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4126 00001611 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4127 00001615 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4128 00001619 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4129                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4130                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4131                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4132 0000161D FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4133                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4134                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4135                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4136                                  r_t_ret:				
  4137 00001621 C3                      		retn
  4138                                  
  4139                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4140                                  
  4141                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4142                                  
  4143                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  4144 00001622 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4145 00001625 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4146 00001628 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4147 0000162B A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4148 0000162E E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4149 00001631 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4150 00001634 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4151 00001637 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4152 0000163A A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4153 0000163D A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4154 00001640 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4155 00001643 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4156 00001646 C3                      		retn
  4157                                  
  4158                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4159                                  
  4160                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4161                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4162                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4163                                  
  4164                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4165 00001647 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4166 00001649 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4167 0000164B B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4168 0000164D D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4169 0000164F D50A                    		aad
  4170 00001651 C3                      		retn
  4171                                  
  4172                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4173                                  
  4174                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4175                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4176                                  
  4177                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4178 00001652 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4179 00001657 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4180 00001659 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4181 0000165B 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4182                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4183                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4184 00001660 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4185 00001662 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4186                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4187                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4188 00001667 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4189                                  century_20:				
  4190 00001669 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4191 0000166E 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4192 00001670 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4193 00001675 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4194 00001677 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4195                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4196 0000167C 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4197 0000167E 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4198 00001683 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4199                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4200                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4201                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4202                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4203                                  		; cf=0
  4204                                  		;clc
  4205                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4206 00001685 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4207 0000168A C3                      		retn
  4208                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4209                                  
  4210                                  date_error:				
  4211 0000168B F9                      		stc
  4212                                  date_err2:
  4213 0000168C C3                      		retn
  4214                                  
  4215                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4216                                  
  4217                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4218                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4219                                  
  4220                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4221 0000168D 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4222 00001692 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4223 00001694 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4224 00001699 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4225                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4226                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4227                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4228                                  		;clc
  4229                                  		;retn
  4230                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4231 0000169B 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4232                                  time_error:
  4233                                  bv_error:	
  4234 000016A0 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4235 000016A1 C3                      		retn
  4236                                  
  4237                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4238                                  
  4239                                  ;time_error:				
  4240                                  		;stc
  4241                                  		;retn
  4242                                  
  4243                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4244                                  
  4245                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4246                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4247                                  
  4248                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4249 000016A2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4250 000016A5 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4251                                  bv_loop:				
  4252 000016A8 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4253 000016AA 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4254 000016AC 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4255                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4256 000016AF 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4257 000016B1 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4258 000016B3 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4259 000016B5 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4260 000016B7 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4261 000016B9 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4262 000016BB 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4263 000016BE 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4264 000016C1 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4265 000016C3 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4266 000016C4 49                      		dec	cx
  4267 000016C5 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4268 000016C7 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4269 000016C8 C3                      		retn
  4270                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4271                                  
  4272                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4273                                  ;bv_error:				
  4274                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4275                                  		;retn
  4276                                  
  4277                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
