  6085                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  6086                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  6087                                  ;**************************************************
  6088                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  6089                                  ;
  6090                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  6091                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  6092                                  ;
  6093                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  6094                                  ;**************************************************
  6095                                  
  6096                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6097                                  bootbias equ 200h
  6098                                  
  6099                                  getboot:	; proc near		
  6100                                  		
  6101                                  		; 08/04/2018
  6102                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  6103                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  6104                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6105                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  6106                                  
  6107 00001CCA 2EA1[D516]              		mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  6108 00001CCE 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  6109                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6110 00001CD0 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  6111                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  6112                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  6113 00001CD3 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6114 00001CD6 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  6115 00001CD8 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  6116 00001CDB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6117                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6118                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6119                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6120 00001CDD 7209                    		jb	short erret
  6121                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6122 00001CDF 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  6123                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  6124                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  6125 00001CE6 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  6126                                  erret:					
  6127 00001CE8 F9                      		stc
  6128                                  norm_ret:				
  6129 00001CE9 C3                      		retn
  6130                                  
  6131                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6132                                  
  6133                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  6134                                  
  6135                                  ;***************************************************************************
  6136                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  6137                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  6138                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  6139                                  ;   determine version number
  6140                                  ;
  6141                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  6142                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  6143                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  6144                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  6145                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  6146                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  6147                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  6148                                  ;***************************************************************************
  6149                                  
  6150                                  sethard:	; proc near		
  6151                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6152                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6153 00001CEA 57                      		push	di
  6154 00001CEB 53                      		push	bx
  6155                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 14/08/2023
  6156 00001CEC 06                      		push	es
  6157 00001CED 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6158 00001CF0 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6159 00001CF3 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6160                                  					; fnon_removable
  6161 00001CF7 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6162                                  					; ffHardFile
  6163 00001CFB C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  6164 00001D00 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  6165 00001D02 52                      		push	dx
  6166 00001D03 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6167 00001D05 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6168                                  					; DL = drive number
  6169                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6170                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6171                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6172 00001D07 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  6173 00001D09 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  6174 00001D0C 5A                      		pop	dx
  6175 00001D0D 7263                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  6176 00001D0F 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  6177 00001D12 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6178 00001D15 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  6179 00001D16 E8B1FF                  		call	getboot
  6180 00001D19 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  6181 00001D1A 7256                    		jb	short setret
  6182 00001D1C BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6183                                  
  6184                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  6185                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  6186                                  
  6187                                  act_part:				
  6188 00001D1F 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  6189 00001D24 7418                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  6190 00001D26 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  6191 00001D2A 740C                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6192 00001D2C 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6193 00001D30 7406                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6194 00001D32 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6195 00001D36 7506                    		jnz	short no_act
  6196                                  got_good_act:				
  6197 00001D38 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  6198 00001D3A 743A                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  6199 00001D3C FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  6200                                  no_act:					
  6201 00001D3E 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6202 00001D41 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6203                                  					; last entry done?
  6204 00001D45 75D8                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  6205 00001D47 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6206                                  					; restore original value of bx
  6207                                  
  6208                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  6209                                  
  6210                                  get_primary:				
  6211 00001D4A 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  6212 00001D4F 7518                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  6213                                  					; the ACTIVE ones
  6214 00001D51 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; see if partitiontype == 1, 4 or 6
  6215 00001D55 740C                    		jz	short got_prim
  6216 00001D57 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6217 00001D5B 7406                    		jz	short got_prim
  6218 00001D5D 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6219 00001D61 7506                    		jnz	short not_prim
  6220                                  got_prim:				
  6221 00001D63 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  6222 00001D65 740F                    		jz	short set2
  6223 00001D67 FECE                    		dec	dh
  6224                                  not_prim:				
  6225 00001D69 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6226 00001D6C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6227 00001D70 75D8                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  6228                                  setret:					
  6229 00001D72 F9                      		stc			; error	return
  6230 00001D73 E9A002                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6231                                  
  6232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6233                                  
  6234                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6235                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6236                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6237                                  ;
  6238                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6239                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6240                                  ;  without change.
  6241                                  ;
  6242                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6243                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6244                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  6245                                  
  6246                                  set2:					
  6247                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6248                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment (0070h)
  6249 00001D76 8816[D716]              		mov	[rom_drv_num], dl
  6250                                  		;mov	[cs:rom_drv_num], dl
  6251                                  			; save the rom bios drive number we are handling now.
  6252 00001D7A 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; hidden sectors (start	sector)
  6253 00001D7E 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  6254                                  
  6255                                  ; decrement the sector count by 1 to make it zero based. exactly 64k
  6256                                  ; sectors should be allowed	
  6257                                  
  6258 00001D82 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6259 00001D85 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6260 00001D88 26034708                		add	ax, [es:bx+8]	; sectors in partition
  6261 00001D8C 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  6262 00001D90 7305                    		jnb	short okdrive
  6263 00001D92 800E[D216]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  6264                                  okdrive:				
  6265 00001D97 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]
  6266 00001D9B 894517                  		mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6267                                  					; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  6268 00001D9E 268B4706                		mov	ax, [es:bx+6]
  6269 00001DA2 894519                  		mov	[di+19h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6270 00001DA5 268B570A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+10]	; # of sectors (high)
  6271 00001DA9 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)
  6272 00001DAD 89551D                  		mov	[di+1Dh], dx	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6273 00001DB0 89451B                  		mov	[di+1Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6274                                  					; bpb->maxsec =	p->partitionlength
  6275 00001DB3 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  6276 00001DB6 7705                    		ja	short okdrive_1
  6277 00001DB8 83F840                  		cmp	ax, 64		; if (p->partitionlength < 64)
  6278 00001DBB 72B5                    		jb	short setret	; return -1;
  6279                                  okdrive_1:				
  6280 00001DBD 8B5519                  		mov	dx, [di+19h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6281 00001DC0 8B4517                  		mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6282 00001DC3 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; boot sector number - for mini	disk
  6283                                  					; usually equal	to the # of sec/trk.
  6284 00001DC5 8A5D13                  		mov	bl, [di+13h]	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6285 00001DC8 50                      		push	ax
  6286 00001DC9 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  6287 00001DCB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6288 00001DCD F7F3                    		div	bx		; (sectors)dx:ax / (BDS.secpertrack)bx =
  6289                                  					; (track)temp_h:ax + (sector)dx
  6290                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6291                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  6292                                  		; 14/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6293 00001DCF A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
  6294 00001DD2 58                      		pop	ax
  6295 00001DD3 F7F3                    		div	bx
  6296 00001DD5 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl
  6297 00001DD7 FEC1                    		inc	cl
  6298 00001DD9 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  6299 00001DDB 8A5D15                  		mov	bl, [di+15h]	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6300 00001DDE 50                      		push	ax
  6301 00001DDF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6302                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_h]
  6303 00001DE1 A1[2905]                		mov	ax, [temp_h] ; 14/08/2023
  6304 00001DE4 F7F3                    		div	bx
  6305                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  6306 00001DE6 A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax ; 14/08/2023
  6307 00001DE9 58                      		pop	ax
  6308 00001DEA F7F3                    		div	bx		; dl is head, ax is cylinder
  6309                                  		; 14/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6310 00001DEC 833E[2905]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
  6311                                  		;cmp	word [cs:temp_h], 0
  6312 00001DF1 775F                    		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6313 00001DF3 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024
  6314 00001DF6 775A                    		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6315                                  			; Retro DOS v3.2 note by Erdogan Tan - 28/07/2019
  6316                                  			; **MSDOS code accepts if ax = 1024 but it is nonsense here
  6317                                  			; ('ja' must be 'jnb')
  6318                                  okdrive_2:
  6319                                   		; 28/07/2019
  6320                                  ; dl is head.
  6321                                  ; ax is cylinder
  6322                                  ; cl is sector number (assume less than 2**6 = 64 for int 13h)
  6323                                  
  6324                                  ;*** for mini disks ***
  6325                                  
  6326 00001DF8 837D4701                		cmp	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  6327                                  					; check	for mini disk
  6328 00001DFC 7503                    		jnz	short oknotmini	; not mini disk.
  6329 00001DFE 034549                  		add	ax, [di+49h]	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  6330                                  					; set the physical track number
  6331                                  oknotmini:
  6332                                  ;*** end of added logic for mini disk
  6333                                  				
  6334 00001E01 D0CC                    		ror	ah, 1		; move high two	bits of	cyl to high
  6335 00001E03 D0CC                    		ror	ah, 1		; two bits of upper byte
  6336 00001E05 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; turn off remainder of	bits
  6337 00001E08 08E1                    		or	cl, ah		; move two bits	to correct spot
  6338 00001E0A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch is	cylinder (low 8	bits)
  6339                                  					; cl is	sector + 2 high	bits of	cylinder
  6340 00001E0C 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; dh is	head
  6341                                  		
  6342                                  		; 14/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6343 00001E0E 8A16[D716]              		mov	dl, [rom_drv_num]
  6344                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:rom_drv_num] ; dl is drive number
  6345                                  
  6346                                  
  6347                                  ; cl is sector + 2 high bits of cylinder
  6348                                  ; ch is low 8 bits of cylinder
  6349                                  ; dh is head
  6350                                  ; dl is drive
  6351                                  
  6352                                  ; for convenience, we are going to read the logical boot sector
  6353                                  ; into cs:disksector area.
  6354                                  
  6355                                  ; read in boot sector using bios disk interrupt. the buffer where it
  6356                                  ; is to be read in is cs:disksector.
  6357                                  
  6358 00001E12 0E                      		push	cs
  6359 00001E13 07                      		pop	es
  6360 00001E14 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; for convenience,
  6361                                  					; we are going to read the logical boot	sector
  6362                                  					; into cs:disksector area.
  6363 00001E17 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6364 00001E1A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6365                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6366                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6367                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6368                                  
  6369                                  ; cs:disksec contains the boot sector. in theory, (ha ha) the bpb in this thing
  6370                                  ; is correct. we can, therefore, suck out all the relevant statistics on the
  6371                                  ; media if we recognize the version number.
  6372                                  
  6373                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6374                                  		;mov	bx, disksector	; BIOSDATA:014Eh ; MSDOS 6.21 ; 11/08/2023
  6375                                  					; BIOSDATA:0152h ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  6376 00001E1C 53                      		push	bx
  6377 00001E1D 50                      		push	ax
  6378                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6379                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment ('disksector:' is in BIOSDATA) 
  6380 00001E1E 803FE9                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E9h
  6381                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0E9h ; is it a near jump?
  6382 00001E21 740B                    		jz	short check_1_ok ; yes
  6383 00001E23 803FEB                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0EBh
  6384                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0EBh ; is it a short jump?
  6385 00001E26 7525                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; no
  6386 00001E28 807F0290                		cmp	byte [bx+2], 90h
  6387                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx+2], 90h ; yes, is the next one a nop?
  6388 00001E2C 751F                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; no, invalid bs ; 11/08/2023
  6389                                  check_1_ok:	
  6390                                  		; 14/08/2023			
  6391 00001E2E BB[5901]                		mov	bx, disksector+11 ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6392                                  		;mov	bx, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6393                                  					; point	to the bpb in the boot record
  6394                                  		;mov	al, [cs:bx+10]	; [bx+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  6395 00001E31 8A470A                  		mov	al, [bx+10] ; 14/08/2023 
  6396                                  					; get the mediadescriptor byte
  6397 00001E34 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h	; mask off low nibble
  6398 00001E36 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; is high nibble = 0Fh?
  6399 00001E38 7513                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; no,	invalid	boot record
  6400                                  		;cmp	word [cs:bx], 512 ; [bx+EBPB.BYTESPERSECTOR]
  6401 00001E3A 813F0002                		cmp	word [bx], 512 ; 14/08/2023
  6402 00001E3E 750D                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; invalidate non 512 byte sectors
  6403                                  
  6404                                  check2_ok:				; yes, mediadescriptor ok.
  6405 00001E40 8A4702                  		mov	al, [bx+2] ; 14/08/2023
  6406                                  		;mov	al, [cs:bx+2]	; now make sure that
  6407                                  					; the sectorspercluster	is
  6408                                  					; a power of 2
  6409                                  					;
  6410                                  					; [bx+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  6411                                  					; get the sectorspercluster
  6412 00001E43 08C0                    		or	al, al		; is it	zero?
  6413 00001E45 7406                    		jz	short invalid_boot_record ; yes, invalid boot record
  6414                                  
  6415                                  ck_power_of_two:			
  6416 00001E47 D0E8                    		shr	al, 1		; shift	until first bit	emerges
  6417 00001E49 73FC                    		jnb	short ck_power_of_two
  6418 00001E4B 740B                    		jz	short valid_boot_record
  6419                                  
  6420                                  invalid_boot_record:			
  6421 00001E4D 58                      		pop	ax
  6422 00001E4E 5B                      		pop	bx
  6423 00001E4F E90F01                  		jmp	unknown		; jump to invalid boot record
  6424                                  					; unformatted or illegal media.
  6425                                  	; 14/08/2023	
  6426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6427                                  setret_brdg:				
  6428 00001E52 E91DFF                  		jmp	setret
  6429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6430                                  
  6431                                  unknown3_0_j:				
  6432 00001E55 E90D01                  		jmp	unknown3_0	; legally formatted media,
  6433                                  					; although, content might be bad.
  6434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6435                                  
  6436                                  valid_boot_record:			
  6437 00001E58 58                      		pop	ax
  6438 00001E59 5B                      		pop	bx
  6439                                  
  6440                                  ; Signature found. Now check version.
  6441                                  
  6442                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6443 00001E5A 817F08322E              		cmp	word [bx+8], '2.'
  6444                                  		;cmp	word [cs:bx+8], '2.' ; 03/10/2022 (NASM syntax)
  6445                                  		;;cmp	word ptr cs:[bx+8], 2E32h ; '2.'
  6446 00001E5F 7506                    		jnz	short try5
  6447 00001E61 807F0A30                		cmp	byte [bx+10], '0'
  6448                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx+0Ah], '0' ; 03/10/2022 (NASM syntax)
  6449                                  		;;cmp	byte ptr cs:[bx+0Ah], 30h ; '0'
  6450                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6451                                  		;jnz	short try5
  6452                                  		;jmp	short copybpb
  6453 00001E65 7425                    		jz	short copybpb
  6454                                  
  6455                                  	; 14/08/2023
  6456                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6457                                  ;
  6458                                  ;setret_brdg:				
  6459                                  ;		jmp	setret
  6460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6461                                  ;
  6462                                  ;unknown3_0_j:				
  6463                                  ;		jmp	unknown3_0	; legally formatted media,
  6464                                  ;					; although, content might be bad.
  6465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6466                                  
  6467                                  try5:					
  6468 00001E67 E8B001                  		call	cover_fdisk_bug
  6469                                  
  6470                                  ; see if it is an os2 signature
  6471                                  
  6472                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6473                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  6474 00001E6A 817F08302E              		cmp	word [bx+8], '0.'
  6475                                  		;cmp	word [cs:bx+8], '0.' ; 03/10/2022 (NASM syntax)
  6476                                  		;;cmp	word ptr cs:[bx+8], 2E30h ; '0.'

  6867                                  					; save number of (root)	dir entries

  6879                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6880                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6881                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!

  6903 00001FBC B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6904 00001FBE 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)

  6907 00001FC4 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx

  6910 00001FCA 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1

  6912                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs

  6916

  6918                                  
  6919                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6920                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6921                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6922                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6923                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6924                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6925                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6926                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6927                                  		
  6928                                  					; dx:ax = TmpVal1, bx = TmpVal2
  6929 00001FD5 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; 
  6930 00001FD7 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2
  6931 00001FDA 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		
  6932 00001FDD 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax = TmpVal1+TmpVal2-1
  6933                                  
  6934                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6935

  6937                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))

  7105                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  7106                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  7107                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same

  7240                                  set_recbpb:				
  7241 000020FD 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7242                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7243 00002100 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7244 00002103 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7245                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7246 00002105 5F                      		pop	di
  7247 00002106 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7248 00002107 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7249 0000210A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7250 0000210D 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7251 0000210F E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7252                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7253                                  
  7254                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7255                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7256                                  		;retn
  7257                                  
  7258                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7259                                  
  7260                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7261                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7262                                  
  7263                                  ; al = device number
  7264                                  
  7265                                  print_init:	
  7266 00002112 98                      		cbw
  7267 00002113 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7268 00002115 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7269 00002117 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7270                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7271                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7272                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7273 00002119 C3                      		retn
  7274                                  
  7275                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7276                                  
  7277                                  ; al = device number
  7278                                  
  7279                                  aux_init:
  7280 0000211A 98                      		cbw
  7281 0000211B 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7282                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  7283                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7284                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7285                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7286 0000211D B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7287 00002120 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7288                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7289                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7290                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7291                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7292 00002122 C3                      		retn
  7293

  7295                                  
  7296                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7297                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
