  7300                                  
  7301                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7302                                  ;
  7303                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7304                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7305                                  ;
  7306                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7307                                  ;
  7308                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7309                                  ;   initialize it.
  7310                                  ;
  7311                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7312                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7313                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7314                                  ;
  7315                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7316                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7317                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7318                                  ;
  7319                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7320                                  ;   save coding.
  7321                                  ;
  7322                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7323                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7324                                  ;
  7325                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7326                                  ;
  7327                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7328                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7329                                  ;
  7330                                  ; called modules:
  7331                                  ;		  getboot
  7332                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7333                                  ;
  7334                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7335                                  ;
  7336                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7337                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7338                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7339                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7340                                  ;
  7341                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7342                                  
  7343                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7344                                  domini:	
  7345 00002123 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7346                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7347 00002127 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7348                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7349 00002129 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7350 0000212B B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7351                                  domini_loop:				
  7352 0000212D 52                      		push	dx
  7353 0000212E 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7354 00002132 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7355 00002134 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7356                                  					; DL = drive number
  7357                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7358                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7359                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7360 00002136 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7361 00002138 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7362 0000213A 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7363 0000213C A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7364 0000213F 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7365 00002142 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7366 00002144 A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7367 00002147 06                      		push	es
  7368 00002148 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7369 0000214C E87BFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7370                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7371 0000214F 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7372 00002151 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7373                                  domininext:				
  7374 00002154 07                      		pop	es
  7375 00002155 5A                      		pop	dx
  7376 00002156 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7377 00002158 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7378 0000215A 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7379                                  dominiret:				
  7380 0000215C C3                      		retn
  7381                                  
  7382                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7383                                  
  7384                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7385                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7386                                  
  7387                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7388                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7389                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7390                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7391                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7392                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7393                                  ;
  7394                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7395                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7396                                  
  7397                                  
  7398                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7399 0000215D 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7400                                  fmpnext:				
  7401 00002161 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7402 00002165 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7403 00002167 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7404 0000216A 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7405 0000216E 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7406                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7407                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7408                                  fmpnextfound:
  7409 00002170 C3                      		retn
  7410                                  
  7411                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7412                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7413                                  ;fmpret:
  7414                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7415                                  
  7416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7417                                  
  7418                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7419                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7420 00002171 E89D00                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7421 00002174 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7422 00002176 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7423 0000217A C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7424                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7425 0000217F 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7426                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7427                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7428 00002183 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7429                                  					; ffHardFile
  7430 00002187 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7431 0000218C A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7432 0000218F 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7433 00002192 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7434 00002195 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7435 00002198 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7436 0000219B 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7437                                  					; set physical number
  7438 0000219E A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7439 000021A1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7440                                  					; set logical number
  7441 000021A4 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7442 000021A9 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7443 000021AB 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7444                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7445 000021B0 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7446                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7447                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7448 000021B2 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7449 000021B5 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7450 000021B9 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7451 000021BC D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7452 000021BE D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7453 000021C0 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7454 000021C4 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7455                                  					; set hidden trks
  7456 000021C7 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7457 000021CB 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7458 000021CF 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7459 000021D3 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7460 000021D6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7461 000021D9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7462                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7463                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7464                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7465 000021DB 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7466 000021DD BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7467                                  
  7468                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7469                                  		;push	es
  7470 000021E0 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7471                                  					; bx value saved.
  7472                                  		;pop	es  ; 14/08/2023
  7473 000021E3 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7474 000021E5 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7475                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7476 000021E8 E976FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7477                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7479                                  
  7480                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7481                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7482                                  		;retn
  7483                                  
  7484                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7485                                  
  7486                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7487                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7488                                  
  7489                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7490                                  	
  7491 000021EB 57                      		push	di
  7492 000021EC 53                      		push	bx
  7493                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7494                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7495                                  		;push	ds
  7496 000021ED 06                      		push	es
  7497                                  setmini_1:				
  7498 000021EE 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7499 000021F2 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7500 000021F4 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7501 000021F8 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7502 000021FA 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7503 000021FE 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7504 00002200 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7505 00002203 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7506 00002207 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7507 00002209 F9                      		stc
  7508 0000220A 07                      		pop	es
  7509                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7510                                  		;pop	ds
  7511 0000220B 5B                      		pop	bx
  7512 0000220C 5F                      		pop	di
  7513 0000220D C3                      		retn
  7514                                  
  7515                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7516                                  setmini_2:				
  7517 0000220E E965FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7518                                  
  7519                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7520                                  
  7521                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7522                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7523                                  ;
  7524                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7525                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7526                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7527                                  ;
  7528                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7529                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7530                                  ;			trash ax
  7531                                  
  7532                                  dmax_check:	
  7533 00002211 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7534 00002216 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7535 00002218 06                      		push	es
  7536                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7537 00002219 B84F04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7538 0000221C 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7539                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7540 0000221E 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7541                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7542                                  					; set message flag
  7543                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7544 00002224 07                      		pop	es
  7545                                  
  7546                                  		;;push	es
  7547                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7548                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7549                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7550                                  					; set message flag
  7551                                  		;;pop	es
  7552                                  		;
  7553                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7554                                  dmax_ok:				
  7555 00002225 C3                      		retn
  7556                                  
  7557                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7558                                  
  7559                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7560                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7561                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7562                                  ;								 
  7563                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7564                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7565                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7566                                  
  7567                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7568 00002226 56                      		push	si
  7569 00002227 53                      		push	bx
  7570 00002228 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7571                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7572 0000222C 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7573 0000222F 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7574                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7575 00002231 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7576 00002233 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7578                                  
  7579                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7580                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7581 00002235 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7582                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7583 00002237 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7584                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7585 0000223A C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7586                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7587 0000223E 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7588                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7589                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7590 00002241 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7591 00002244 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7592 00002248 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7593 0000224A 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7594 0000224F FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7595 00002253 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7596 00002258 5B                      		pop	bx
  7597 00002259 5E                      		pop	si
  7598 0000225A C3                      		retn
  7599                                  
  7600                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7601                                  
  7602                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7603                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7604                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7605                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7606                                  
  7607                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7608 0000225B 50                      		push	ax
  7609 0000225C 51                      		push	cx
  7610 0000225D 52                      		push	dx
  7611 0000225E 55                      		push	bp
  7612 0000225F 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7613                                  loop_clock:				
  7614 00002261 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7615 00002263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7616 00002265 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7617 00002267 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7618                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7619                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7620                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7621 00002269 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7622 0000226C 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7623 0000226E 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7624 00002271 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7625 00002273 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7626 00002276 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7627 00002278 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7628 00002279 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7629                                  delay:					
  7630 0000227C E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7631 0000227E EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7633                                  
  7634                                  clock_present:				
  7635 00002280 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7636 00002286 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7637                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7638                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7639 00002289 56                      		push	si
  7640 0000228A E89BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7641 0000228D FA                      		cli
  7642                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7643 0000228E 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7644 00002292 FB                      		sti
  7645 00002293 5E                      		pop	si
  7646                                  
  7647                                  no_readdate:				
  7648 00002294 5D                      		pop	bp
  7649 00002295 5A                      		pop	dx
  7650 00002296 59                      		pop	cx
  7651 00002297 58                      		pop	ax
  7652 00002298 C3                      		retn
  7653                                  
  7654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7655                                  
  7656                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7657                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7658                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7659                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7660                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7661                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7662                                  ;
  7663                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7664                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7665                                  ;
  7666                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7667                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7668                                  ;
  7669                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7670                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7671                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7672                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7673                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7674                                  ;
  7675                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7676                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7677                                  
  7678                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7679                                  
  7680                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7681                                  
  7682                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7683                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7684                                  			
  7685 00002299 50                      		push	ax
  7686 0000229A 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7687 000022A0 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7688 000022A2 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7689                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7690 000022A8 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7691 000022AA 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7692                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7693 000022B0 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7694                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7695                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7696                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7697                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7698                                  cmosck4:				
  7699 000022B2 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7700                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7701 000022B4 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7702                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7703 000022B6 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7704 000022B9 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7705                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7706 000022BB E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7707 000022BE 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7708                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7709 000022C0 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7710 000022C2 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7711                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7712 000022C4 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7713                                  cmosck9:				
  7714 000022C7 58                      		pop	ax
  7715 000022C8 C3                      		retn
  7716                                  
  7717                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7718                                  
  7719                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7720                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7721                                  ;									       :
  7722                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7723                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7724                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7725                                  ;									       :
  7726                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7727                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7728                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7729                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7730                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7731                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7732                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7733                                  
  7734                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7735 000022C9 9C                      		pushf
  7736 000022CA FA                      		cli
  7737 000022CB 53                      		push	bx
  7738 000022CC 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7739 000022CD 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7740 000022CF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7741                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7742 000022D1 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7743 000022D2 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7744 000022D4 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7745 000022D6 58                      		pop	ax
  7746 000022D7 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7747 000022D9 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7748 000022DB E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7749                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7750 000022DD 90                      		nop
  7751 000022DE E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7752 000022E0 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7753 000022E2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7754 000022E3 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7755 000022E4 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7756 000022E7 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7757                                  
  7758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7759                                  
  7760                                  cmos_popf:				
  7761 000022E8 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7762                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7763                                  
  7764                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7765                                  
  7766                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7767                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7768                                  ;									       :
  7769                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7770                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7771                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7772                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7773                                  ;									       :
  7774                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7775                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7776                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7777                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7778                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7779                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7780                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7781                                  
  7782                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7783 000022E9 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7784 000022EA 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7785 000022EB FA                      		cli
  7786 000022EC 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7787 000022ED 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7788 000022EF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7789                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7790 000022F1 90                      		nop
  7791 000022F2 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7792 000022F4 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7793 000022F6 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7794 000022F7 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7795 000022F9 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7796 000022FB E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7797                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7798 000022FD 90                      		nop
  7799 000022FE E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7800 00002300 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7801 00002301 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7802 00002302 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7803 00002305 C3                      		retn
  7804                                  
  7805                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7806                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7808                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7810                                  
  7811                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7812                                  ;
  7813                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7814                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7815                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7816                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7817                                  
  7818                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7819                                  
  7820                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7821                                  ;
  7822                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7823                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7824                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7825                                  
  7826                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7827                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7828                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7829                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7830                                  
  7831                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7832                                  getclus:				
  7833 00002306 51                      		push	cx
  7834 00002307 57                      		push	di
  7835 00002308 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7836 0000230D 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7837 0000230F 48                      		dec	ax
  7838 00002310 48                      		dec	ax
  7839 00002311 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7840                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7841                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7842 00002313 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7843 00002318 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7844                                  unpack:					
  7845 0000231D 1E                      		push	ds
  7846 0000231E 50                      		push	ax
  7847 0000231F 53                      		push	bx
  7848 00002320 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7849 00002325 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7850 00002327 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7851 00002329 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7852                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7853 0000232F 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7854 00002331 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7855                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7856 00002333 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7857                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7858 00002335 52                      		push	dx
  7859 00002336 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7860 00002338 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7861 0000233B 5A                      		pop	dx
  7862 0000233C 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7863 0000233E 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7864                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7865                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7866 00002340 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7867 00002344 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7868 00002345 52                      		push	dx
  7869 00002346 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7870 00002348 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7871 0000234B 5A                      		pop	dx
  7872                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7873 0000234C A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7874 0000234F 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7875 00002353 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7876                                  even_odd:				
  7877 00002357 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7878 00002358 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7879 00002359 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7880 0000235B 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7881 0000235D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7882                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7883 0000235F D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7884 00002361 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7885 00002363 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7886                                  havclus:				
  7887 00002365 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7888 00002367 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7889 0000236B EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7890                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7891                                  
  7892                                  unpack16:				
  7893 0000236D 52                      		push	dx
  7894 0000236E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7895 00002370 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7896 00002372 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7897 00002375 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7898 00002378 5A                      		pop	dx
  7899 00002379 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7900                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7901                                  unpackx:				
  7902 0000237B 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7903 0000237C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7904 0000237D 1F                      		pop	ds
  7905 0000237E 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7906 00002380 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7907 00002383 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7908 00002385 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7909 0000238A EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7911                                  
  7912                                  getcl2:					
  7913 0000238C 53                      		push	bx
  7914 0000238D 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7915 0000238E 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7916 0000238F 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7917 00002393 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7918 00002398 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7919 00002399 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7920                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7921 0000239E 1E                      		push	ds
  7922 0000239F 0E                      		push	cs
  7923 000023A0 1F                      		pop	ds
  7924 000023A1 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7925                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7926 000023A2 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7927                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7928                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7929 000023A5 E8BDF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7930 000023A8 1F                      		pop	ds
  7931 000023A9 5B                      		pop	bx
  7932 000023AA 5F                      		pop	di
  7933 000023AB 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7934 000023AF 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7935 000023B1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7936 000023B3 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7937 000023B5 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7938 000023B6 C3                      		retn
  7939                                  
  7940                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7941                                  
  7942                                  
  7943                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7944                                  ;
  7945                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7946                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7947                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7948                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7949                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7950                                  ;
  7951                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7952                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7953                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7954                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7955                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7956                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7957                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7958                                  
  7959                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7960                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7961 000023B7 50                      		push	ax
  7962 000023B8 51                      		push	cx
  7963 000023B9 57                      		push	di
  7964 000023BA 56                      		push	si
  7965 000023BB 06                      		push	es
  7966 000023BC 1E                      		push	ds
  7967 000023BD 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7968 000023BF 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7969 000023C4 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7970 000023C6 90                      		nop
  7971                                  
  7972                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7973                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7974                                  
  7975 000023C7 06                      		push	es
  7976 000023C8 1E                      		push	ds
  7977 000023C9 57                      		push	di
  7978 000023CA 50                      		push	ax
  7979 000023CB 0E                      		push	cs
  7980 000023CC 1F                      		pop	ds
  7981                                  
  7982 000023CD 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7983 000023D1 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7984                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7985                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7986 000023D4 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7987 000023D5 E88DF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7988 000023D8 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7989 000023D9 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7990                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7991 000023DD 5F                      		pop	di
  7992 000023DE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7993 000023DF 07                      		pop	es
  7994 000023E0 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7995 000023E5 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7996 000023E7 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7997                                  					; sector number
  7998                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7999 000023EB 52                      		push	dx
  8000 000023EC 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8001                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8002                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8003 000023F3 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8004 000023F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8005 000023F8 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8006 000023FC 1E                      		push	ds
  8007 000023FD 07                      		pop	es
  8008 000023FE 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8009 00002400 1E                      		push	ds
  8010 00002401 0E                      		push	cs
  8011 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  8012 00002403 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8013 00002404 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8014                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8015                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8016 00002407 E85BF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8017 0000240A 1F                      		pop	ds
  8018 0000240B 5A                      		pop	dx
  8019 0000240C 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8020                                  
  8021                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8022 00002411 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8023 00002412 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8024                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8025                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8026 00002414 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8027 00002416 1F                      		pop	ds
  8028 00002417 07                      		pop	es
  8029 00002418 5E                      		pop	si
  8030 00002419 5F                      		pop	di
  8031 0000241A 59                      		pop	cx
  8032 0000241B 58                      		pop	ax
  8033 0000241C C3                      		retn
  8034                                  
  8035                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8036                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8037                                  
  8038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8039                                  
  8040                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8041                                  		;db 0
  8042                                  
  8043                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8044                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8045                                  
  8046                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8047 0000241D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8048                                  %endif
  8049                                  
  8050                                  ;align 16
  8051                                  
  8052                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8053                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8054                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8055                                  
  8056                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8059                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8060                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022

  8069                                  
  8070                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022

  8077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8078                                  
  8079                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8080 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8081 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8082                                  
  8083                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8084                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8085                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8086                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8087                                  
  8088                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8089                                  
  8090                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8091                                  
  8092                                  ;************************************************************************
  8093                                  ;*									*
  8094                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8095                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8096                                  ;*									*
  8097                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8098                                  ;*									*
  8099                                  ;************************************************************************
  8100                                  
  8101                                  _seg_reinit:
  8102 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8103                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8104                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8105 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8106 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8107                                  
  8108                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  8109 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8110 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8111 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8112 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8113 00000042 CB                      		retf
  8114                                  
  8115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8116                                  
  8117                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8118                                  
  8119                                  ;************************************************************************
  8120                                  ;*									*
  8121                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8122                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8123                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8124                                  ;*									*
  8125                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8126                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8127                                  ;*									*
  8128                                  ;************************************************************************
  8129                                  
  8130                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8131 00000043 56                      		push	si
  8132 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  8133 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  8134 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  8135 00000047 57                      		push	di
  8136 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  8137 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  8138 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  8139 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  8140 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8141 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8142                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8143                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8144 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8145 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8146 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8147 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8148 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8149 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8150 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8151 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8152 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8153 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8154                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8155 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8156                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8157                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8158 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8159                                  
  8160                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8161                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8162                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8163                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8164                                  ;
  8165                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8166                                  ;
  8167                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8168                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8169                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8170                                  ;
  8171                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8172                                  
  8173                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8174 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8175 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8176 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8177 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8178                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8179                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8180 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8181 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8182                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8183                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8184 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8185 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8186 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8187 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8188 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8189 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8190 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8191 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8192 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8193 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8194                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8195 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8196                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8197 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8198 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8199                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8200                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8201                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8202                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8203 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8204                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8205 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8206 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8207                                  					; mark operation complete
  8208 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8209 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8210 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8211 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8212 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8213 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8214 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8215 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8216 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8217 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8218                                  	
  8219                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8221                                  bc_retf:
  8222 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8224                                  
  8225                                  command_error:				
  8226 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8227 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8228                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8229                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8230                                  
  8231                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8232                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8233                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8234                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8235                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8236                                  ; high.
  8237                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8238                                  
  8239                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8240                                  
  8241                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8242                                  
  8243 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8244                                  
  8245 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8246                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8247                                  		
  8248                                  
  8249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8250                                  
  8251                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8252                                  
  8253                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8254 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8255                                  					; unknown command error
  8256                                  
  8257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8258                                  
  8259                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8260                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8261                                  
  8262                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8263                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8264                                  
  8265                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8266                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8267                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8268 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8269 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8270                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8271 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8272 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8273 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8274                                  
  8275                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8276                                  
  8277                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8278
