  8280                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8282                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8283                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8284                                  
  8285                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8290                                  
  8291                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8292                                  
  8293                                  ;************************************************************************
  8294                                  ;*									*
  8295                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8296                                  ;*									*
  8297                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8298                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8299                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8300                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8301                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8302                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8303                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8304                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8305                                  ;*									*
  8306                                  ;************************************************************************
  8307                                  
  8308                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8309                                  		;db 0
  8310                                  
  8311                                  		; 13/12/202
  8312 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8313                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8314 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8315                                  					; 00 init
  8316 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8317 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8318 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8319                                  					; 03
  8320 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8321                                  					; 04
  8322 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8323                                  					; 05
  8324 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8325 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8326                                  					; 07
  8327 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8328                                  					; 08
  8329 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8330 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8331                                  con_table_end:
  8332 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8333                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8334 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8335 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8336 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8337 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8338 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8339                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8340 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8341                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8342 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8343 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8344 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8345 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8346 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8347 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8348 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8349 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8350 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8351 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8352 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8353 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8354 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8355 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8356 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8357 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8358 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8359 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8360 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8361 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8362                                  prn_table_end:
  8363 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8364                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8365 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8366 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8367 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8368 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8369 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8370 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8371 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8372 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8373 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8374 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8375 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8376                                  aux_table_end:
  8377 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8378                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8379 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8380 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8381 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8382 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8383 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8384 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8385 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8386 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8387 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8388 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8389                                  tim_table_end:
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ;************************************************************************
  8394                                  ;*									*
  8395                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;************************************************************************
  8398                                  
  8399                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8400                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8401 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8402                                  con_loop:				
  8403 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8404 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8405 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8406                                  con_exit:				
  8407 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8408 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8409                                  
  8410                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8411                                  
  8412                                  ;************************************************************************
  8413                                  ;*									*
  8414                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8415                                  ;*									*
  8416                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8417                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8418                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8419                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8420                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8421                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8422                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8423                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8424                                  ;*									*
  8425                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8426                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8427                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8428                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8429                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8430                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8431                                  ;*									*
  8432                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8433                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8434                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8435                                  ;*									*
  8436                                  ;************************************************************************
  8437                                  
  8438                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8439                                  chrin:		
  8440 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8441 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8442 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8443 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8444 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8445 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8446 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8447 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8448 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8449 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8450 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8451 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8453                                  
  8454                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8455                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8456                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8457                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8458                                  ;      else
  8459                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8460                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8461                                  ;      endif
  8462                                  ;    endif
  8463                                  ;  endif
  8464                                  
  8465                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8466 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8467 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8468 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8469 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8470 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8471 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8472 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8473 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8475                                  
  8476                                  not_ext:				
  8477 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8478 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8479                                  alt_save:				
  8480 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8481                                  keyret:					
  8482 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8483                                  
  8484                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8485                                  
  8486                                  ;************************************************************************
  8487                                  ;*									*
  8488                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8489                                  ;*									*
  8490                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8491                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8492                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8493                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8494                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8495                                  ;*									*
  8496                                  ;************************************************************************
  8497                                  
  8498                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8499                                  con_rdnd:				
  8500 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8501 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8502 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8503 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8504 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8505 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8506 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8507 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8508 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8509                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8510 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8511                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8512 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8513 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8514 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8515 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8516                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8517                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8518                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8519                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8520 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8521 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8522 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8524                                  
  8525                                  gotchr:					
  8526 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8527 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8528 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8529 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8530 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8532                                  
  8533                                  notbrk:					
  8534 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8535 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8536 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8537 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8538                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8539                                  
  8540                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8541 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8542 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8543 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8544 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8545 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8546 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8547 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8548                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8549                                  rdexit:					
  8550 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8551 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8552                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8553                                  bc_exvec:				
  8554 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8555                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8556 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8558                                  
  8559                                  ;************************************************************************
  8560                                  ;*									*
  8561                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8562                                  ;*									*
  8563                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8564                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8565                                  ;*									*
  8566                                  ;************************************************************************
  8567                                  
  8568                                  con_writ:
  8569                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8570 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8571                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8572                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8573                                  con_lp:					
  8574 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8575 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8576 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8577                                  					; AL = character to display
  8578 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8579                                  cc_ret:					
  8580 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8581 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8582                                  
  8583                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8584                                  
  8585                                  ;************************************************************************
  8586                                  ;*									*
  8587                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8588                                  ;*									*
  8589                                  ;************************************************************************
  8590                                  
  8591                                  con_flush:
  8592 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8593                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8594 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8595 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8596                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8597                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8598                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8599 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8600 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8601 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8602                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8603 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8604                                  
  8605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8606                                  
  8607                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8608                                  
  8609                                  ;************************************************************************
  8610                                  ;*									*
  8611                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8612                                  ;*									*
  8613                                  ;************************************************************************
  8614                                  
  8615                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8616                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8617                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8618                                  
  8619                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8620                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8621                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8622                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8623                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8624                                  ;
  8625                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8626                                  
  8627                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8628                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8629                                  
  8630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8631                                  
  8632                                  ;************************************************************************
  8633                                  ;*									*
  8634                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8635                                  ;*									*
  8636                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8637                                  ;*									*
  8638                                  ;************************************************************************
  8639                                  
  8640                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8641 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8642                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8643                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8644                                  prn_done:
  8645 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8646 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8647                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ;************************************************************************
  8650                                  ;*									*
  8651                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8652                                  ;*									*
  8653                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8654                                  ;*									*
  8655                                  ;************************************************************************
  8656                                  
  8657                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8658                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8659 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8660                                  prn_loop:				
  8661 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8662                                  prn_out:				
  8663 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8664 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8665 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8666 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8667 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8668 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8669 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8670 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8671 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8672 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8673 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8675                                  
  8676                                  _prnwf:					
  8677 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8678 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8679                                  TestPrnError:				
  8680 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8681 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8682                                  pmessg:					
  8683 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8685                                  
  8686                                  prn_con:				
  8687 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8688 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8689                                  ;prn_done:				
  8690                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8691                                  prn_done2:
  8692                                  		;clc
  8693                                  		; cf=0
  8694 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8695                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8696                                  
  8697                                  ;************************************************************************
  8698                                  ;*									*
  8699                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8700                                  ;*									*
  8701                                  ;************************************************************************
  8702                                  
  8703                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8704 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8705 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8706 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8707                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8708                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8709 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8710 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8711                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8712                                  
  8713                                  ;************************************************************************
  8714                                  ;*									*
  8715                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8716                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;************************************************************************
  8719                                  
  8720                                  prnstat:				
  8721 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8722                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8723                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8724                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8725                                  
  8726                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8727                                  
  8728                                  ;************************************************************************
  8729                                  ;*									*
  8730                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8731                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8732                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8733                                  ;*									*
  8734                                  ;************************************************************************
  8735                                  
  8736                                  prnop:	
  8737 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8738 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8739                                  
  8740                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8741                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8742                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8743                                  
  8744 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8745 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8746 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8747 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8748 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8749 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8750 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8751                                  
  8752                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8753                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8754                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8755                                  
  8756                                  NextTest:				
  8757 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8758                                  					; i/o error?
  8759 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8760                                  
  8761                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8762                                  
  8763 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8764                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8765 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8766 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8767 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8768                                  ret1:					
  8769 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8771                                  
  8772                                  checknotready:				
  8773 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8774 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8775 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8776                                  
  8777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8778                                  
  8779                                  ;************************************************************************
  8780                                  ;*									*
  8781                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8782                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8783                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8784                                  ;*									*
  8785                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8786                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8787                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8788                                  ;*									*
  8789                                  ;************************************************************************
  8790                                  
  8791                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8792                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8793 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8794                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8795 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8796 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8797 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8798 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8799 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8800                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8801 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8802 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8803                                  prn_getstat:				
  8804 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8805 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8806 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8807 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8808 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8809 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8810 000002A6 26                      		es
  8811 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8812                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8813                                  					; lodsb
  8814 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8815 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8816 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8817 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8818                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8819                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8820                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8821 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8822                                  
  8823                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8824                                  
  8825                                  prn_bperr:				
  8826 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8827                                  prn_berr:				
  8828 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8829                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ;************************************************************************
  8834                                  ;*									*
  8835                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;************************************************************************
  8838                                  
  8839                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8840                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8841                                  
  8842                                  ;********************************;*
  8843                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8844                                  ;********************************;*
  8845                                  
  8846                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8847                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8848                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8849                                  
  8850                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8851                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8852                                  ;;endstruc
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8857                                  
  8858                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8859                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8860 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8861 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8862                                  					; ioc_pc
  8863 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8864                                  
  8865                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8866 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8867                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8868                                  
  8869                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8870 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8871 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8872 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8873                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8874 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8875 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8876                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8877 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8878 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8879 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8880 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8881 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8882 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8883                                  prngetcount:				
  8884                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8885 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8886 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8887                                  					; return current retry count
  8888                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8889                                  		; cf=0
  8890                                  		;clc
  8891 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8893                                  
  8894                                  ;************************************************************************
  8895                                  ;*									*
  8896                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8897                                  ;*									*
  8898                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8899                                  ;************************************************************************
  8900                                  
  8901                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8902 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8903 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8904                                  					; ioc_pc
  8905 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8906 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8907 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8908 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8909 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8910 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8911                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8912                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8913                                  		; cf=0		
  8914                                  		;clc
  8915 00000302 C3                      		retn
  8916                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8917                                  
  8918                                  prn_query_err:
  8919                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8920                                  		;stc
  8921 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8922                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8923                                  
  8924                                  ;************************************************************************
  8925                                  ;*									*
  8926                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8927                                  ;*									*
  8928                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8929                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8930                                  ;*									*
  8931                                  ;************************************************************************
  8932                                  
  8933                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8934                                  
  8935                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8936                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8937                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8938                                  
  8939                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8940                                  
  8941                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8942                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8943                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8944                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8945                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8946                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8947                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8948                                  
  8949                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8950                                  
  8951                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8952                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8953                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8954                                  
  8955                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8956                                  
  8957                                  ;************************************************************************
  8958                                  ;*									*
  8959                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8960                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8961                                  ;*									*
  8962                                  ;************************************************************************
  8963                                  
  8964                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8965                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8966 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8967 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8968 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8969 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8970 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8971 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8972                                  aux1:					
  8973 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8974                                  					; won't return if error
  8975                                  aux2:					
  8976 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8977 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8978                                  exvec2:					
  8979 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8980                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8981 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8983                                  
  8984                                  ;************************************************************************
  8985                                  ;*									*
  8986                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8987                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8988                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8989                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8990                                  ;*									*
  8991                                  ;************************************************************************
  8992                                  
  8993                                  auxin:					
  8994 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8995 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8996 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8997                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8998                                  		;retn
  8999                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9000 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9001                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9002                                  
  9003                                  arbad:					
  9004 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9005 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9006 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9007 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9008                                  
  9009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9010                                  
  9011                                  ;************************************************************************
  9012                                  ;*									*
  9013                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9014                                  ;*									*
  9015                                  ;************************************************************************
  9016                                  
  9017                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9018 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  9019 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9020 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9021 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9022 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9023 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9024 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9025 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9026 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9027 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9028 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9029                                  auxdrx:					
  9030 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9032                                  
  9033                                  auxbus:					
  9034 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9036                                  
  9037                                  ;************************************************************************
  9038                                  ;*									*

  9040                                  ;*									*

  9043                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9045 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9046 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9047 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9048 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9049                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9050                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9051                                  		;clc
  9052 00000359 C3                      		retn
  9053                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9054                                  
  9055                                  ;************************************************************************
  9056                                  ;*									*
  9057                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9058                                  ;*									*
  9059                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9060                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9061                                  ;*									*
  9062                                  ;************************************************************************
  9063                                  
  9064                                  auxstat:				
  9065 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9066                                  
  9067                                  		; fall into auxop
  9068                                  
  9069                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9070                                  
  9071                                  ;************************************************************************
  9072                                  ;*									*
  9073                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9074                                  ;*									*
  9075                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9076                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9077                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
