 11087                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11088                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 11089                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 11090                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 11091                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 11092                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 11093                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 11094                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 11095                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11096                                  
 11097                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 11098                                  Disk:
 11099                                  
 11100                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 11101                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 11102                                  
 11103 00000A53 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 11104                                  					; set up retry count
 11105 00000A56 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 11106                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 11107 00000A5B 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 11108 00000A5D 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 11109 00000A60 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 11110 00000A62 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 11111                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 11112 00000A65 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 11113 00000A69 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 11114 00000A6D 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 11115                                  ;retry:
 11116                                  ; 09/12/2022
 11117                                  _retry:					
 11118 00000A71 50                      		push	ax
 11119 00000A72 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 11120 00000A76 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11121 00000A7B 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 11122 00000A7D 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 11123                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 11124 00000A82 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 11125 00000A84 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 11126                                  					; add hidden trks.
 11127                                  disk_not_mini:				
 11128 00000A88 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11129 00000A8A D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11130 00000A8C 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 11131 00000A90 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 11132 00000A92 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 11133 00000A94 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 11134 00000A98 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 11135                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11136 00000A9C 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 11137 00000AA1 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 11138                                  
 11139                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 11140                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 11141                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 11142                                  
 11143 00000AA3 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 11144 00000AA8 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 11145 00000AAA 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 11146 00000AAD 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 11147 00000AAF 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 11148 00000AB2 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 11149                                  do_writej:	
 11150                                  
 11151                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 11152                                  			
 11153 00000AB4 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 11154                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11155                                  
 11156                                  do_fast:				
 11157 00000AB6 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 11158                                  
 11159                                  testerr:				
 11160 00000AB9 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 11161                                  
 11162                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 11163                                  
 11164 00000ABB 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 11165 00000ABF 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11166                                  no_set:
 11167                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 11168 00000AC3 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 11169 00000AC9 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 11170                                  noverify:				
 11171 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 11172                                  
 11173                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 11174                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 11175                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 11176                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 11177                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 11178                                  
 11179 00000ACC 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11180                                  					; fnon_removable
 11181 00000AD1 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 11182 00000AD3 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 11183 00000AD8 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 11184                                  its_removable:				
 11185 00000ADA 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 11186 00000ADD 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11187 00000ADF 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 11188 00000AE3 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 11189 00000AE5 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 11190 00000AE9 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11191                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 11192 00000AED 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 11193 00000AEF C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 11194 00000AF4 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 11195 00000AF8 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11196 00000AFA 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11197 00000AFE 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11198 00000B00 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11199 00000B02 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11200                                  noxor:					
 11201 00000B06 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11202                                  disk_ret:				
 11203 00000B0A F8                      		clc
 11204 00000B0B C3                      		retn
 11205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11206                                  
 11207                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11208                                  
 11209                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11210                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11211                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11212                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11213                                  
 11214                                  do_write:				
 11215 00000B0C 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11216 00000B10 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11217 00000B12 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11218 00000B16 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11219                                  
 11220                                  do_norm:				
 11221 00000B18 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11222 00000B1B EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11223                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11224                                  
 11225                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11226                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11227                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11228                                  
 11229                                  doverify:				
 11230 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11231 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11232 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11233 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11234 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11235                                  
 11236                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11237                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11238                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11239                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11240                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11241                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11242                                  
 11243 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11244 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11245 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11246 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11247 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11248 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11250                                  
 11251                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11252 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11253 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11254 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11255                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11256                                  
 11257                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11258                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11259                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11260                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11261                                  
 11262                                  dskerr:					
 11263 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11264 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11265 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11266                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11267 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11268 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11269 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11270 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11271                                  dochkagain:				
 11272 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11273                                  dskerr0:				
 11274 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11275 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11276                                  					; fnon_removable
 11277 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11278 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11279 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11280                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11281 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11282 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11283 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11284                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11285                                  dskerr1:				
 11286 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11287                                  		;jmp	retry
 11288                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11289 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11290                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11291                                  
 11292                                  write_fault_err:			
 11293 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11294                                  					; for write fault error.
 11295 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11296                                  
 11297                                  		; fall into harderr
 11298                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11299                                  
 11300                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11301                                  
 11302                                  harderr:				
 11303 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11304                                  harderr2:				
 11305 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11306                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11307 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11308 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11309                                  
 11310                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11311                                  
 11312                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11313                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11314 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11315                                  
 11316                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11317                                  
 11318                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11319                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11320                                  
 11321                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11322                                  normspeed:
 11323 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11324 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11325 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11326 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11327 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11328 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11329 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11330 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11331 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11332 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11333 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11334 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11335 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11336                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11337 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11338 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11339                                  
 11340                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11341                                  
 11342                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11343                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11344                                  
 11345                                  fastspeed:		
 11346 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11347                                  					; ftoobig
 11348 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11349 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11350 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11351 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11352 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11353 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11354 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11356                                  
 11357                                  notready:				
 11358 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11359 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11360 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11361                                  
 11362                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11365                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11366                                  
 11367                                  maperror:	
 11368 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11369 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11370 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11371 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11372 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11373 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11374 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11375                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11376 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11377 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11378                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11379 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11380                                  					; get translation
 11381                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11382                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11383 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11384 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11385 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11386 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11387                                  
 11388                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11389                                  
 11390                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11391                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11392                                  
 11393                                  set_tim:		
 11394 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11395 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11396                                  
 11397                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11398                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11399                                  
 11400 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11401 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11402 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11403                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11404                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11405 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11406                                  setaccess:				
 11407 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11408 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11409 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11410                                  done_set:				
 11411 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11412                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11413 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11414 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11415                                  
 11416                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11417                                  
 11418                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11419                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11420                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11421                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11422                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11423                                  
 11424                                  again:	
 11425 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11426 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11427 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11428                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11429 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11430 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11431                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11432                                  
 11433                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11434 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11435 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11436

 11446                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11447                                  ;
 11448                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11449                                  ;
 11450                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11451                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11452                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11453                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11454                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11455                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11456                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11457                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11458                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11459                                  
 11460                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11461                                  
 11462                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11463                                  
 11464                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11465 00000C12 00                      		db 0
 11466                                  
 11467                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11468                                  %if 0
 11469                                  
 11470                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11471                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11472                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11473                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 11474                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11475                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11476                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11477                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11478                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11479                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11480                                  
 11481                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11482                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11483                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11484                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11485                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11486                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11487                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11488                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11489                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11490                                  
 11491                                  %endif

 11494 00000C13 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 11495 00000C14 [7E0C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 11496 00000C16 [C00E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 11497 00000C18 [600E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 11498 00000C1A [7A0C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 11516                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11517                                  ;
 11518                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11519                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.

 11541                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11542                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11543                                  ;
 11544                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11545                                  ;
 11546                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11547                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11548                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11549                                  ;
 11550                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11551                                  
 11552                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11553                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11554                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh

 11558 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]

 11561 00000C53 07                      		pop	es

 11565                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive

 11567                                  		; 10/12/2022

 11839                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11840                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11841                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11842                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11843                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11844                                  ;
 11845                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11846                                  ;
 11847                                  ; output:
 11848                                  ;	for status call:
 11849                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11850                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11851                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11852                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11853                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11854                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11855                                  ;
 11856                                  ;	for format track:
 11857                                  ;		carry set if error
 11858                                  ;
 11859                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11860                                  
 11861                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11862                                  
 11863                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11864                                  FormatTrack:
 11865 00000D9C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11866 00000DA0 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 11867 00000DA3 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11868                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11871                                  		; 17/10/2022

 11877 00000DB4 F8                      		clc
 11878 00000DB5 C3                      		retn
 11879                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11880

 12012                                  
 12013                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12014                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12015                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12016                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12017                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12018                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12019                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12020                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12021                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12022                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12023                                  		; register.
 12024                                  
 12025                                  					; Special function requested?

 12032 00000E91 08E4                    		or	ah, ah

 12126                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12127                                  
 12128                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12131                                  ;
 12132                                  ; TrackIo:
 12133                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12134                                  ;
 12135                                  ;   input:
 12136                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12137                                  ;		  3 = write
 12138                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12139                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12140                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12141                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12142                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12143                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12144                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12145                                  ;
 12146                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12147                                  
 12148                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12149                                  		
 12150                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12151                                  TrackIo:	
 12152                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12153 00000EF4 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12154 00000EF8 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12155 00000EFB 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12156                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12157 00000F00 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12158 00000F02 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12159 00000F03 51                      		push	cx
 12160 00000F04 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12161 00000F07 59                      		pop	cx
 12162 00000F08 58                      		pop	ax
 12163                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12164 00000F09 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12165 00000F0C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12166 00000F0E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12167 00000F10 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12168                                  
 12169                                  		; WE WANT:
 12170                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12171                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12172                                  		
 12173 00000F12 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12174                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12175 00000F15 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12176                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12177                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12178 00000F1A 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12179                                  		
 12180 00000F1C 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12181                                  ionextsector:				
 12182 00000F1E 51                      		push	cx
 12183 00000F1F 52                      		push	dx
 12184 00000F20 46                      		inc	si
 12185 00000F21 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12186                                  					; the track table
 12187 00000F22 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12188 00000F23 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12189                                  
 12190                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12191                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12192                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12193                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12194                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12195

 12204                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12205 00000F32 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12206 00000F34 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12207 00000F38 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12208 00000F3A E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12209 00000F3D 5A                      		pop	dx
 12210 00000F3E 59                      		pop	cx
 12211 00000F3F F8                      		clc
 12212 00000F40 C3                      		retn
 12213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12214                                  
 12215                                  IoRemovable:				
 12216 00000F41 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12217                                  					; table	and save it

 12221 00000F45 50                      		push	ax

 12233                                  					; sector size

 12241

 12257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12258                                  
 12259                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12260                                  ;
 12261                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12262                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12263                                  ; are permissible.
 12264                                  ;
 12265                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12266                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index

 12300                                  ; SetDASD

 12310                                  SetDasd:

 12312                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12313 00000F7E 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12314                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12315 00000F80 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12317                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12329 00000F9C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2

 12333 00000FA1 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1

 12346                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12347 00000FA8 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12348 00000FA9 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12349 00000FAE 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12350                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive

 12368                                  
 12369 00000FC0 C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12370                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12371 00000FC4 5E                      		pop	si
 12372 00000FC5 1F                      		pop	ds
 12373 00000FC6 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12374 00000FC8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12375 00000FCC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12376                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12377                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12378 00000FCE 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12379 00000FD2 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12382                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12387                                  ;
 12388                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12389                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12390                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12391                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12392                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12393                                  ;
 12394                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12395                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12396                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12397                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12400                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12401                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12402                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12403                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12404                                  ;
 12405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12406                                  
 12407                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12408                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12409 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12410 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12411                                  
 12412                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12413                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12414                                  
 12415 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12416 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12417 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12418 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12419 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12420 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12422                                  
 12423                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12424 00000FEB 06                      		push	es
 12425 00000FEC 56                      		push	si
 12426                                  
 12427                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12428                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12429 00000FED 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12430 00000FEF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12431                                  
 12432 00000FF1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12433                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12434                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12435 00000FF6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12436 00000FFA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12437                                  
 12438                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12439                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12440                                  
 12441 00000FFE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12442 00001003 5E                      		pop	si
 12443 00001004 07                      		pop	es
 12444                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12445 00001005 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12446 00001009 49                      		dec	cx
 12447 0000100A 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12448 0000100D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12449 0000100F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12450 00001011 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12451 00001013 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12452 00001017 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12453 0000101B 06                      		push	es
 12454 0000101C 1E                      		push	ds
 12455 0000101D 56                      		push	si
 12456 0000101E 57                      		push	di
 12457 0000101F B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12458 00001021 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12459                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12460 00001023 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12461 00001025 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12462 0000102A 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12463 0000102C 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12464                                  		
 12465                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12466                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12467 0000102D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12468 0000102F 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12469 00001031 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12470                                  
 12471 00001032 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12472                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12473                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 12544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12545                                  ;
 12546                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12547                                  ;
 12548                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12549                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12550                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12551                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12552                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 12565                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12566                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 12572                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 12574                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12575 0000107F 58                      		pop	ax

 12582                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12583                                  ;
 12584                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12585                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12586                                  ;
 12587                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12588                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12589                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12590                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12591                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12592                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12593                                  ;
 12594                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12595                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12596                                  ;
 12597                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12598                                  
 12599                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12600                                  ToRom:	
 12601 00001081 53                      		push	bx
 12602 00001082 56                      		push	si

 12605                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.

 12652                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12653                                  
 12654                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12655                                  
 12656                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12657                                  ;
 12658                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12659                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12660                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12661                                  ;
 12662                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12663                                  
 12664                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12665                                  ioctl_getown:
 12666 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12667 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12668                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12669 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12670                                  ownloop:				
 12671 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12672 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12673                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12674 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12675                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12676                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12677 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12678                                  getnextBDS:				
 12679 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12680 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12682                                  
 12683                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12684                                  ;
 12685                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12686                                  ; in al to al.
 12687                                  ;
 12688                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12689                                  
 12690                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12691                                  ioctl_setown:
 12692 000010F6 E8D2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12693 000010F9 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12694                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12695 000010FE E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12696                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12697 00001101 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12698                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12699                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12700                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12701                                  
 12702                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12703                                  ;
 12704                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12705                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12706                                  ;
 12707                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12708                                  
 12709                                  exitown:				
 12710 00001105 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl

 12714                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12715 0000110C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 12717                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12718                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12719 00001112 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12720                                  exitnomult:				
 12721 00001114 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12722 00001118 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12723                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12724                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12725                                  		; cf=0
 12726                                  		;clc
 12727 0000111B C3                      		retn

 12777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12778                                  
 12779                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12780                                  
 12781                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12782                                  ;	get media id
 12783                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12784                                  ;
 12785                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12786                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12787                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12788                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12789                                  ;
 12790                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12791                                  ;
 12792                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12793                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12794                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12795                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12796                                  ;
 12797                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12798                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12799                                  ;
 12800                                  ; LOGIC:
 12801                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12802                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12803                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12804                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12805                                  ;
 12806                                  ; {
 12807                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12808                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12809                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12810                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12811                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12812                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12813                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12814                                  ;		};
 12815                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12816                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12817                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12818                                  ;		};
 12819                                  ;	else
 12820                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12821                                  ;
 12822                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12823                                  
 12824                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12825                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12826                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12827                                  
 12828                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12829                                  GetMediaId:
 12830 0000114A E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12831 0000114D 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12832 00001151 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12833 00001156 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12834 00001159 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12835                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12836 0000115B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12837                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12838 00001160 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12839                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12840 00001162 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12841 00001165 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12842                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12843                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12844 00001168 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12845 0000116A C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12846 0000116E 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12847                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12848 00001172 46                      		inc	si
 12849                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12850                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12851 00001173 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12852 00001176 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12853                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12854                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12855 00001179 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12856                                  	
 12857                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12858                                  		; cf = 0
 12859                                  		;clc
 12860                                  
 12861 0000117B C3                      		retn
