 12863                                  
 12864                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12865 0000117C B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12866 0000117E F9                      		stc
 12867                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12868 0000117F C3                      		retn
 12869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12870                                  
 12871                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12872                                  
 12873                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12874                                  ;  set media id
 12875                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12876                                  
 12877                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12878                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12879                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12880                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12881                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12882                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12883                                  ;
 12884                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12885                                  ;
 12886                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12887                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12888                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12889                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12890                                  ;
 12891                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12892                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12893                                  ;
 12894                                  ; logic:
 12895                                  ;
 12896                                  ; {
 12897                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12898                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12899                                  ;	BootIo;
 12900                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12901                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12902                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12903                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12904                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12905                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12906                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12907                                  ;		};
 12908                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12909                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12910                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12911                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12912                                  ;		};
 12913                                  ;	else
 12914                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12917                                  
 12918                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12919                                  SetMediaId:
 12920 00001180 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12921 00001183 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12922                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12923 00001187 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12924 00001189 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12925 0000118E 52                      		push	dx
 12926 0000118F E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12927 00001192 5A                      		pop	dx
 12928 00001193 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12929                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12930 00001195 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12931                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12932 0000119A 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12933 0000119C 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12934                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12935 000011A1 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12936 000011A3 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12937 000011A4 57                      		push	di
 12938 000011A5 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12939 000011A6 07                      		pop	es
 12940 000011A7 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12941 000011AA C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12942 000011AE C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12943 000011B1 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12944 000011B4 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12945                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12946                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12947 000011B7 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12948 000011B9 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12949 000011BA 1F                      		pop	ds
 12950 000011BB 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12951 000011BC 07                      		pop	es
 12952 000011BD E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12953 000011C0 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12954 000011C2 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12955 000011C7 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12956 000011CA C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12957                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12958                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12959 000011CF C3                      		retn
 12960                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12961                                  
 12962                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12963 000011D0 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12964 000011D2 F9                      		stc
 12965                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12966 000011D3 C3                      		retn
 12967                                  
 12968                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12969                                  
 12970                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12971                                  
 12972                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12973                                  ;	BootIo
 12974                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12975                                  ;
 12976                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12977                                  ;
 12978                                  ; input :
 12979                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12980                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12981                                  ;
 12982                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12983                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12984                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12985                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12986                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12987                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12988                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12989                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12990                                  ;
 12991                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12992                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12993                                  ;
 12994                                  ; logic:
 12995                                  ;
 12996                                  ; {
 12997                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12998                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12999                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13000                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13001                                  ; }
 13002                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13003                                  
 13004                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13005                                  BootIo:	
 13006 000011D4 06                      		push	es
 13007 000011D5 57                      		push	di
 13008 000011D6 53                      		push	bx
 13009 000011D7 1E                      		push	ds
 13010 000011D8 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13011                                  
 13012                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13013                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13014                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13015                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13016                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13017                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13018                                  
 13019 000011D9 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13020 000011DC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13021 000011DE 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13022 000011E2 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13023 000011E5 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13024 000011E8 5B                      		pop	bx
 13025 000011E9 5F                      		pop	di
 13026 000011EA 07                      		pop	es
 13027 000011EB C3                      		retn
 13028                                  
 13029                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13030                                  
 13031                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13032                                  
 13033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13034                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13036                                  ;
 13037                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13038                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13039                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13040                                  ; history in the flags.
 13041                                  ;
 13042                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13043                                  ;
 13044                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13045                                  ;
 13046                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13047                                  ;
 13048                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13049                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13050                                  ;
 13051                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13052                                  
 13053                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13054 000011EC 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13055 000011F0 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13056 000011F2 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13057                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13058 000011F4 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13059                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13060                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13061 000011F9 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13062 000011FB 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13063 00001200 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13064 00001202 E8DE06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13065 00001205 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13066                                  
 13067                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13068                                  
 13069 00001207 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13070 00001209 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13071                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13072                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13073 0000120B 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13074 0000120D 53                      		push	bx
 13075 0000120E BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13076                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13077                                  					; physical drive
 13078 00001211 E8A806                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13079 00001214 5B                      		pop	bx
 13080                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13081 00001215 C3                      		retn
 13082                                  
 13083                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13084                                  
 13085                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13086                                  
 13087                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13088                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13089                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13090                                  ;
 13091                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13092                                  ;
 13093                                  ; INPUT :
 13094                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13095                                  ;
 13096                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13097                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13098                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13099                                  
 13100                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13101                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13102 00001216 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13103 0000121A C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13104                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13105                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13106 0000121D 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13107                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13108 0000121F 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13109                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13110                                  					; unformatted_media
 13111 00001224 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13112 00001226 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13113                                  
 13114                                  GafDone:				
 13115 00001228 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13116 0000122B C3                      		retn
 13117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13118                                  
 13119                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13120                                  
 13121                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13122                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13123                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13124                                  ;
 13125                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13126                                  ;
 13127                                  ; input :
 13128                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13129                                  ;
 13130                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13131                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13132                                  
 13133                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13134                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13135 0000122C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13136 00001230 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13137                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13138 00001233 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13139                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13140                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13141 00001238 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13142 0000123C 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13143                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13144 0000123E 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13145                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13146                                  					; unformatted_media
 13147                                  saf_Done:				
 13148 00001243 C3                      		retn
 13149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13150                                  
 13151                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13152                                  
 13153                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13154                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13155                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13156                                  ;
 13157                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13158                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13159                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13160                                  ;
 13161                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13162                                  
 13163                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13164                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13165 00001244 06                      		push	es
 13166 00001245 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13167 00001249 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13168                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13169 0000124D 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13170                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13171 0000124F 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13172 00001251 0E                      		push	cs
 13173 00001252 07                      		pop	es
 13174 00001253 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13175                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13176 00001256 BF[370C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13177                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13178                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13179 00001259 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13180 0000125B F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13181 0000125D 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13182 0000125F B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13183                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13184                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13185                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13186                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13187                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13189                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 13190 00001262 07                      		pop	es
 13191                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13192                                  		; cf = 0
 13193                                  		;clc
 13194 00001263 C3                      		retn
 13195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13196                                  nosupport:				
 13197 00001264 07                      		pop	es
 13198 00001265 E96DEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13200                                  
 13201                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13202                                  
 13203                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13204                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13205                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13206                                  ;
 13207                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13208                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13209                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13210                                  ;	    drive)
 13211                                  ;
 13212                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13213                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13214                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13215                                  ;
 13216                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13217                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13218                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13219                                  ;
 13220                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13221                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13222                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13223                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13224                                  ;
 13225                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13226                                  ;
 13227                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13228                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13229                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13230                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13231                                  ; 
 13232                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13233                                  
 13234                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13235                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13236 00001268 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13237 0000126C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13238                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13239                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13240 0000126F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13241 00001271 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13242                                  		;
 13243 00001273 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13244                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13245                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13246                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13247 00001277 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13248                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13249 00001279 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13250 0000127B 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13251 0000127D FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13252                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13253 0000127F FEC8                    		dec	al
 13254 00001281 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13255 00001283 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13256 00001285 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13257 00001287 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13258 00001289 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13259 0000128B 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13260 0000128D 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13261                                  GotMediaType:				
 13262 0000128F 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13263                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13264                                  		; cf = 0
 13265                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13266 00001292 C3                      		retn
 13267                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13268                                  
 13269                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13270 00001293 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13271 00001296 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13272 00001298 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13273 0000129A 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13274 0000129D 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13275                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13276 0000129F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13277                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13278 000012A1 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13279 000012A3 F9                      		stc
 13280 000012A4 C3                      		retn
 13281                                  
 13282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13283                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13284                                  		;db    0
 13285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13286                                  
 13287                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13288                                  
 13289                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13290                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13291                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13292                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13293                                  
 13294                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13295                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13296                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13297                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13298                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13299                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13300                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13301                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13302                                  ;
 13303                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13304                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13305                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13306                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13307                                  ;
 13308                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13309                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13310                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13311                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13312                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13313                                  ;
 13314                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13315                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13316                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13317                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13318                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13319                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13320                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13321                                  
 13322                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13323                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13324                                  
 13325                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13326                                  
 13327                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13328 000012A5 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13329 000012A8 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13330 000012AA 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13331 000012AD 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13332                                  
 13333                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13334                                  
 13335 000012AF 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13336 000012B2 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13337 000012B4 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13338 000012B7 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13339 000012B9 E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13340                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13341                                  
 13342                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13343 000012BC CF                      		iret
 13344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13345                                  
 13346                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 13347 000012BD 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13348 000012BE 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13349                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13350                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13351                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13352 000012C0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13353                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13354                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13355                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13356                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13357                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13358                                  		
 13359                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13360                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13361 000012C5 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13362                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13363 000012C9 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13364                                  
 13365                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13366                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13367                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13368                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13369                                  		
 13370                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13371                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13372 000012CD 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13373 000012D1 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13374                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13375                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13376 000012D4 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13377 000012D8 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13378                                  
 13379 000012DC 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13380                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13381                                  		;pop	bx
 13382 000012DD 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13383                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13384 000012DE 58                      		pop	ax
 13385                                  i2f_iret:
 13386 000012DF CF                      		iret
 13387                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13388                                  
 13389                                  mine:					
 13390 000012E0 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13391 000012E2 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13392 000012E4 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13393 000012E6 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13394 000012E8 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13395                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13396                                  		; 02/09/2023

 13404 000012F1 7423                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector

 13407

 13411                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]

 13416 000012FD 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13417 00001301 1F                      		pop	ds
 13418                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry

 13420                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13421 00001302 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13422                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13423                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13424                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13425                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13426                                  
 13427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13428                                  
 13429                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13430 00001307 06                      		push	es
 13431 00001308 1E                      		push	ds
 13432 00001309 1E                      		push	ds
 13433 0000130A 07                      		pop	es
 13434                                  		; 17/10/2022

 13437                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13438 00001310 E8BC03                  		call	install_bds
 13439 00001313 1F                      		pop	ds
 13440 00001314 07                      		pop	es

 13442                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13443 00001315 CF                      		iret

 13447                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13448 00001316 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
