 14632                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14633                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14634                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14635                                  
 14636                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14637 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14638 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14638 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14638 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14639                                  
 14640                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14641 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14641 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14641 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14641 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14642 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14643                                  
 14644                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14645                                  
 14646                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14647                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14648                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14649                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14650                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14651                                  
 14652                                  chkopcnt:		
 14653 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14654 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14655                                  
 14656                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14657                                  
 14658                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14659                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14660                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14661                                  ;
 14662                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14663                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  
 14665                                  mediacheck:	
 14666 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14667 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14668 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14669 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14670 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14671 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14672 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14673 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14674 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14675                                  					; set logical drive number
 14676 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14677 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14678                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14679                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14680 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14681 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14682 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14683 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14684                                  
 14685                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14686                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14687                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14688                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14689                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14690                                  ; status.
 14691                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14692 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14693 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14694                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14695                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14696                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14697                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14698 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14699                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14700                                  
 14701                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14702                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14703                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14704                                  
 14705 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14706 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14707 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14708 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14709 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14710 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14711 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14712 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14713 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14714                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14715 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14716                                  mediaret:				
 14717 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14719                                  
 14720                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14721                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14722                                  ; or write.
 14723                                  
 14724                                  mediadovolid:				
 14725 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14726 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14727 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14728 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14729 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14731                                  
 14732                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14733                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14734                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14735                                  ; dos.
 14736                                  ;
 14737                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14738                                  
 14739                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14740                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14741                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14742                                  
 14743                                  checklatchio:	
 14744                                  
 14745                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14746                                  			
 14747 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14748 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14749                                  
 14750                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14751                                  
 14752 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14753 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14754                                  
 14755                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14756                                  ; expensive verification.
 14757                                  
 14758 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14759 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14760 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14761 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14762 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14763 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14764 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14765                                  checklatchret:				
 14766 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14767                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14768 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14769 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14770                                  checkret:				
 14771 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14773                                  
 14774                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14775                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14776                                  ;
 14777                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14778                                  
 14779                                  checkfatvid:				
 14780 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14781 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14782 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14783                                  
 14784                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14785                                  
 14786                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14787                                  
 14788                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14789                                  
 14790                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14791                                  ;
 14792                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14793                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14794                                  ;
 14795                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14796                                  ;
 14797                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14798                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14799                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14800                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14801                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14802                                  ;
 14803                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14804                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14805                                  ; routine.)
 14806                                  ;
 14807                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14808                                  
 14809                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14810                                  check_vid:
 14811                                  
 14812                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14813                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14814                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14815                                  
 14816 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14817                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14818                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14819 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14820 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14821 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14822 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14823 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14824                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14825 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14826                                  					; if not fat system
 14827 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14828 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14829 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14830 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14831                                  					; definitely changed
 14832 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14833                                  
 14834 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14835                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14836 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14837                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14838                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14839                                  		;clc
 14840                                  checkfatret:				
 14841 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14843                                  
 14844                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14845                                  changed_drv:
 14846 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14847 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14848                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14849 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14851                                  
 14852                                  ; extended id check
 14853                                  
 14854                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14855                                  
 14856                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14857                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14858                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14859                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14860                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14861                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14862                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14863                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14864                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14865                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14866                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14867                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14868                                  ;
 14869                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14870                                  
 14871                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14872                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14873 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14874                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14875                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14876 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14877                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14878 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14879 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14880 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14881 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14882 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14883 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14884                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14885                                  					; don't know
 14886 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14887 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14888                                  					; reset the flag
 14889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14890                                  
 14891                                  ext_changed:
 14892 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14893                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14894 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14895                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14896                                  					; disk changed!
 14897                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14898                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14899                                  		;clc
 14900 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14903                                  
 14904                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14905                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14906                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14907                                  ;
 14908                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14909                                  
 14910                                  checkio:				
 14911 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14912 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14913 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14914 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14915 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14916 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14917 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14918 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14919 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14920 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14921 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14922 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14923                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14924                                  
 14925                                  checkioerr:				
 14926 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14927                                  
 14928                                  checkioret:				
 14929 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14930 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14932                                  
 14933                                  no_error_map:				
 14934 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14935                                  
 14936                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14937                                  
 14938                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14939                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14940                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14941                                  
 14942                                  returnvid:		
 14943 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14944                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14945 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14946 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14947 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14948 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14949                                  
 14950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14953                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14954                                  ;
 14955                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14956                                  ; **trashes si**
 14957                                  
 14958                                  media_set_vid:				
 14959 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14960                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14961                                  
 14962                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14963                                  
 14964                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14965                                  
 14966                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14967                                  
 14968                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14969                                  vid_into_packet:
 14970 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14971 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14972 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14973 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14974 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14975 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14976 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14977                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14978 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14979                                  
 14980                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14981                                  
 14982                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14983                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14984                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14985                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14986                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14987                                  ;
 14988                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14989                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14990                                  ;
 14991                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14992                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14993                                  ;		carry set
 14994                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14995                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14996                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14997                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14998                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14999                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15000                                  ;
 15001                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15002                                  
 15003                                  hidensity:
 15004                                  
 15005                                  ; check for correct drive
 15006                                  		
 15007                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15008 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15009                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15010                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15011 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15012                                  
 15013                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15014                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15015                                  
 15016 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15017 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15018                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15019                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15020 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15021 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15022                                  
 15023                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15024                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15025                                  
 15026                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15027 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15028 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15029                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15030                                  					; ffOther
 15031 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15032 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15033                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15034                                  					; ff288
 15035 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15036 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15037 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15038                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15039                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15040 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15041                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15042                                  					; 2 sides
 15043                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15044 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15045 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15046                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15047                                  					; & head max
 15048                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15049 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15050                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15051                                  
 15052                                  Is720K:
 15053                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15054 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15055                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15056 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15058                                  
 15059                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15060                                  ;dofloppy:
 15061                                  		;retn
 15062                                  
 15063                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15064                                  
 15065                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15068                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15069                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15070                                  ;
 15071                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15072                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15073                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15074                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15075                                  ;
 15076                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15077                                  ;
 15078                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15079                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15080                                  
 15081                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15082 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 15083 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 15084                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15085                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15086 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15087                                  
 15088                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15089                                  
 15090                                  scan_bds:				
 15091 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15092 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15093                                  
 15094                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15095                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15096                                  
 15097 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15098                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15099                                  get_next_bds:				
 15100 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15101                                  					; go to	next bds
 15102 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15103 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15104 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 15105 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 15106 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 15107                                  
 15108                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15109                                  
 15110                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15111                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15112                                  ;
 15113                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15114                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15115                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15116                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15117                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15118                                  
 15119                                  checkromchange:	
 15120                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15121                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15122 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15123                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15124                                  					; fchanged
 15125 000018DC C3                      		retn
 15126                                  
 15127                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15128                                  
 15129                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15130                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15131                                  ;
 15132                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15133                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15134                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15135                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15136                                  
 15137                                  resetchanged:	
 15138                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15139                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15140 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15141                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15142                                  					; ~fchanged
 15143 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 15144                                  
 15145                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15146                                  
 15147                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15148                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15149                                  ;
 15150                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15151                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15152                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15153                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15154                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15155                                  
 15156                                  haschange:
 15157                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15158                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15159 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15160                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15161                                  					; fchangeline
 15162 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 15163                                  
 15164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15165                                  
 15166                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15167                                  
 15168                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15169                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15170                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15171                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15172                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15173                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15174                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15175                                  
 15176                                  ; set_volume_id
 15177                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15178                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15179                                  ;
 15180                                  ;   on entry:
 15181                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15182                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15183                                  ;
 15184                                  ;   on exit:
 15185                                  ;	carry clear:
 15186                                  ;	   successful call
 15187                                  ;	carry set
 15188                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15189                                  
 15190                                  set_volume_id:				
 15191 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15192 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15193 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15194 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15195 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15196 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15197 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15198 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15199                                  setvret:				
 15200                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15201                                  		; cf = 0
 15202                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15203 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15204 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15205 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15206                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15207                                  
 15208                                  seterr:					
 15209 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15210 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15211 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15212                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15213 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15214                                  
 15215                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15216                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15217                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15218                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15219                                  
 15220                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15221                                  
 15222                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15223                                  
 15224                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ;   on entry:
 15227                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15228                                  ;
 15229                                  ;   on exit:
 15230                                  ;	carry clear
 15231                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15232                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15233                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15234                                  ;
 15235                                  ;	carry set:
 15236                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15237                                  
 15238                                  read_volume_id:
 15239 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15240 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15241 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15242 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15243 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15244 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15245 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15246 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15247 0000190B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15248 0000190E BE[FD08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15249 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15250 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15251 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15252 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15253 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15254                                  					; # of fats
 15255 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15256                                  					; sectors / fat
 15257 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15258 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15259                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15260                                  					;
 15261                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15262                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15263 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15264                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15265                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15266 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15267                                  					; # root dir entries
 15268 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15269 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15270                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15271                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15272 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15273                                  next_sec:				
 15274 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15275 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15276                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15277                                  					; get sector #
 15278 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15279                                  					; sectors / track
 15280 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15281 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15282                                  
 15283                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15284                                  
 15285 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15286                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15287 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15288 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15289 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15290                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15291 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15292 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15293 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15294                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15295 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15296 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15297 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15298                                  fvid_loop:
 15299                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15300 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15301                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15302 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15303 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15304 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15305 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15306 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15307                                  ent_loop:				
 15308 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15309 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15310 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15311 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15312                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15313                                  					; next sector
 15314 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15315                                  notfound:
 15316                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15317                                  		;xor	si, si
 15318 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15320                                  
 15321                                  found_vid:
 15322                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15323                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15324 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15325 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15326 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15327 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15328 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15329 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15330 0000197B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15331 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15332                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15333 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15334                                  		;xor	al, al
 15335                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15336 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15337 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15338                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15339                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15340                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15341 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15342 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15343                                  fvid_ret:
 15344                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15345 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15346                                  				
 15347 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15348                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15349                                  		; cf = 0
 15350                                  		;clc
 15351                                  rvidret:
 15352 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15353 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15354 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15355 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15357                                  
 15358                                  no_vid:
 15359 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15360                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15361                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15362 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15364                                  
 15365                                  readviderr:				
 15366 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15367 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15368 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15369                                  
 15370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15371                                  
 15372                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15373                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15374                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15375 00001995 BE[0909]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15376                                  		;
 15377                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15378                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15379                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15380                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15381 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15382 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15383                                  		;
 15384 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15385 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15386                                  
 15387                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15390                                  ;
 15391                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15392                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15393                                  
 15394                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15395 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15396 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15397 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15398                                  		
 15399                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15400                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15401                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15402                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15403                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15404                                  		;cld
 15405                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15406 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15407                                  
 15408 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15409 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15410 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15411 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15412 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15413                                  
 15414                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15415                                  
 15416                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15417                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15418                                  ;
 15419                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15420                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15421                                  
 15422                                  check_volume_id:
 15423 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15424 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15425                                  		
 15426                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15427                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15428                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15429                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15430                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15431                                  		;cld
 15432                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15433 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15434                                  
 15435 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15436 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15437 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15438 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15439                                  
 15440                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15441                                  
 15442                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15443                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15444                                  ;
 15445                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15446                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15447                                  ;
 15448                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15449                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15450                                  ;
 15451                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15452                                  
 15453                                  fat_check:		
 15454 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15455 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15456 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15457 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15458                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15459 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15460 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15461                                  okret1:					
 15462 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15463 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15464                                  
 15465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15466                                  
 15467                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15468                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15469                                  
 15470                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15471                                  
 15472                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15473                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15474                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15475                                  
 15476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15477                                  
 15478                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15479                                  		;db 0
 15480                                  
 15481                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15482                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15483                                  
 15484                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15485 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15486                                  %endif
 15487                                  
 15488                                  ;align 16
 15489                                  
 15490                                  ; 09/12/2022
