 30872                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30873                                  	inc     ax
 30874                                  	mov     es,ax
 30875                                  
 30876                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30877                                  huX:	
 30878                                  	pop	es
 30879                                  	pop	ax
 30880                                  	retn
 30881                                  
 30882                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30883                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30884                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30885                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30886                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30887                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30888                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30889                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30890                                  
 30891                                  isTiny:
 30892                                  	push	ax
 30893                                  
 30894                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30895                                  	;
 30896                                  	;push	ds
 30897                                  	;push	cs
 30898                                  	;pop	ds
 30899                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30900                                  	;pop	ds
 30901                                  
 30902                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30903                                  
 30904                                  	or	al,al
 30905                                  	pop	ax
 30906                                  	retn
 30907                                  
 30908                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30909                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30910                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30911                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30912                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30913                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30914                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30915                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30916                                  
 30917                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30918                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30919                                  ;	retn
 30920                                  
 30921                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30922                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30925                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30926                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30927                                  ; USES:     None
 30928                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30929                                  
 30930                                  hideMCB:
 30931                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30932                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30933                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30934                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30935                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30936                                  	retn
 30937                                  
 30938                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30939                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30940                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30941                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30942                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30943                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30944                                  ; USES:     None
 30945                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30946                                  
 30947                                  unHideMCB:
 30948                                  	push	ax
 30949                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30950                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30951                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30952                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30953                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30954                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30955                                  	pop	ax
 30956                                  	retn
 30957                                  
 30958                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30959                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30960                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30961                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30962                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30963                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30964                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30965                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30966                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30967                                  
 30968                                  findUMB:
 30969                                  	push	ax
 30970                                  	push	cx
 30971                                  	push	dx
 30972                                  
 30973                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30974                                  
 30975                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30976                                  
 30977                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30978                                  	mov	es,ax
 30979                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30980                                  
 30981                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30982                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30983                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30984                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30986                                  
 30987                                  fu10:	
 30988                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30989                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30990                                  
 30991                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30992                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30993                                  
 30994                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30995                                  fu20:	
 30996                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30997                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30998                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30999                                  
 31000                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31001                                  	mov     ax,es
 31002                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31003                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31004                                  	inc     ax
 31005                                  	mov     es,ax
 31006                                  
 31007                                  	jmp	short fu10
 31008                                  fuE:	
 31009                                  	stc
 31010                                  fuX:
 31011                                  	pop	dx
 31012                                  	pop	cx
 31013                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 31014                                  	retn
 31015                                  
 31016                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31017                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 31018                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31019                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31020                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 31021                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 31022                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 31023                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31024                                  
 31025                                  BigFree:
 31026                                  	push	bx
 31027                                  	push	cx
 31028                                  
 31029                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 31030                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 31031                                  
 31032                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 31033                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 31034                                  
 31035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31036                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31037                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 31038                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 31039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 31040                                  
 31041                                  bf10:	
 31042                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 31043                                  	jz	short bf30
 31044                                  
 31045                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31046                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31047                                  	jnz	short bf20
 31048                                  
 31049                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31050                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 31051                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 31052                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 31053                                  
 31054                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 31055                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 31056                                  	mov	cx,ax
 31057                                  
 31058                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31059                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 31060                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 31061                                  
 31062                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31063                                  	mov     ax,es
 31064                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31065                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31066                                  	inc     ax
 31067                                  	mov     es,ax
 31068                                  
 31069                                  	jmp	short bf10
 31070                                  
 31071                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 31072                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 31073                                  	or	bx,bx
 31074                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 31075                                  bfE:	
 31076                                  	stc
 31077                                  bfX:
 31078                                  	pop	cx
 31079                                  	pop	bx
 31080                                  	retn
 31081                                  
 31082                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31083                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 31084                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31085                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 31086                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 31087                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31088                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31089                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31090                                  
 31091                                  isSpecified:
 31092                                  	push	ax
 31093                                  
 31094                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31095                                  	mov	bl,al
 31096                                  
 31097                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31098                                  	;
 31099                                  	;push	ds
 31100                                  	;push	cs
 31101                                  	;pop	ds
 31102                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31103                                  	;pop	ds
 31104                                  	
 31105                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31106                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31107                                  
 31108                                  	pop	ax
 31109                                  	retn
 31110                                  
 31111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31112                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31113                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31114                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31115                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31116                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31117                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31118                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31119                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31120                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31121                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31122                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31123                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31124                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31125                                  
 31126                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31127                                  
 31128                                  shrinkMCB:
 31129                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 31130                                  	push	bx
 31131                                  	push	cx
 31132                                  	push	es
 31133                                  
 31134                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31135                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31136                                  
 31137                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31138                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31139                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31140                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31141                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31142                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31143                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31144                                  
 31145                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31146                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31147                                  
 31148                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31149                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31150                                  
 31151                                  	add	ax,bx
 31152                                  	inc	ax
 31153                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31154                                  
 31155                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31156                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31157                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31158                                  	; ax > 0
 31159                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31160                                  
 31161                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31162                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31163                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31164                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31165                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31166                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31167                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31168                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31169                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31170                                  
 31171                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31172                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31173                                  
 31174                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31175                                  	; cf=0
 31176                                  	;clc
 31177                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31178                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31179                                  smE:	
 31180                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31181                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31182                                  	;stc
 31183                                  smX:	
 31184                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31185                                  	pop	es
 31186                                  	pop	cx
 31187                                  	pop	bx
 31188                                  	retn
 31189                                  
 31190                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31191                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31192                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31193                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31194                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31195                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31196                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31197                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31198                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31199                                  ;
 31200                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31201                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31202                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31203                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31204                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31205                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31206                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31207                                  ;       Endif
 31208                                  ;    Endif
 31209                                  ; Endif
 31210                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31211                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31212                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31213                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31214                                  ;    ENDIF
 31215                                  ; ENDIF
 31216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31217                                  
 31218                                  _hideUMB_:
 31219                                  	push	bx
 31220                                  	push	dx
 31221                                  	push	es
 31222                                  
 31223                                  	mov	al,cl
 31224                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31225                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31226                                  
 31227                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31228                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31229                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31230                                  
 31231                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31232                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31233                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31234                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31235                                  
 31236                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31237                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31238                                  
 31239                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31240                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31241                                  
 31242                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31243                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31244                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31245                                  hu_10:	
 31246                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31247                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31248                                  
 31249                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31250                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31251                                  
 31252                                  	mov	dx,es
 31253                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31254                                  
 31255                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31256                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31257                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31258                                  
 31259                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31260                                  hu_30:	
 31261                                  	mov	al,cl
 31262                                  
 31263                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31264                                  
 31265                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31266                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31267                                  
 31268                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31269                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31270                                  hu_X:	
 31271                                  	pop	es
 31272                                  	pop	dx
 31273                                  	pop	bx
 31274                                  	retn
 31275                                  
 31276                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31277                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31278                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31279                                  ; Entry:  None
 31280                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31281                                  ; Error:  None
 31282                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31283                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31284                                  
 31285                                  UnFreeze:
 31286                                  	push	ax
 31287                                  	push	es
 31288                                  
 31289                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31290                                  	jc	short ufX
 31291                                  
 31292                                  	mov	es,ax
 31293                                  
 31294                                  ; ------------------------------
 31295                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31296                                  ; ------------------------------
 31297                                  
 31298                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31299                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31300                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31301                                  uf20:	
 31302                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31303                                  
 31304                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31305                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31306                                  
 31307                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31308                                  	mov     ax,es
 31309                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31310                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31311                                  	inc     ax
 31312                                  	mov     es,ax
 31313                                  
 31314                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31315                                  ufX:	
 31316                                  	pop	es
 31317                                  	pop	ax
 31318                                  	retn
 31319                                  
 31320                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31321                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31323                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31324                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31325                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31326                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31327                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31328                                  
 31329                                  isFrozMCB:
 31330                                  	;push	ax
 31331                                  
 31332                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31333                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31334                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31335                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31336                                  
 31337                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31338                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31339                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31340                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31341                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31342                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31343                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31344                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31345                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31346                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31347                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31348                                  	jne	short ifmX
 31349                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31350                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31351                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31352                                  ifmX:	
 31353                                  	;pop	ax
 31354                                  	retn
 31355                                  
 31356                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31357                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31358                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31359                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31360                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31361                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31362                                  ; USES:     None
 31363                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31364                                  
 31365                                  frezMCB:
 31366                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 31367                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31368                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31369                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31370                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31371                                  	retn
 31372                                  
 31373                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31374                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31375                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31376                                  ; Entry:  None
 31377                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31378                                  ; Error:  None
 31379                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31380                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31381                                  
 31382                                  FreezeUM:
 31383                                  	push	ax
 31384                                  	push	cx
 31385                                  	push	dx
 31386                                  	push	es
 31387                                  
 31388                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 31389                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31390                                  
 31391                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31392                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31393                                  
 31394                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31395                                  	mov	es,ax
 31396                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31397                                  
 31398                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31399                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31400                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31401                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31402                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31403                                  
 31404                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31405                                  	jnz	short fum20
 31406                                  
 31407                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31408                                  fum20:	
 31409                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31410                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31411                                  
 31412                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31413                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31414                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31415                                  
 31416                                  	call	frezMCB
 31417                                  fum30:	
 31418                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31419                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31420                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31421                                  
 31422                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31423                                  	mov     ax,es
 31424                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31425                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31426                                  	inc     ax
 31427                                  	mov     es,ax
 31428                                  	
 31429                                  	jmp	short fum10
 31430                                  
 31431                                  fumX:	pop	es
 31432                                  	pop	dx
 31433                                  	pop	cx
 31434                                  	pop	ax
 31435                                  	retn
 31436                                  
 31437                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31438                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31439                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31440                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31441                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31442                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31443                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31444                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31445                                  
 31446                                  UmbTest:
 31447                                  	push	ax
 31448                                  	push	bx
 31449                                  	push	ds
 31450                                  	push	es
 31451                                  
 31452                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 31453                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 31454                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 31455                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 31456                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 31457                                  
 31458                                  	pop	es
 31459                                  	pop	ds
 31460                                  	pop	bx
 31461                                  	pop	ax
 31462                                  	retn
 31463                                  
 31464                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31465                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31466                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31467                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31468                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31469                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31470                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31471                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31472                                  
 31473                                  WalkMem:
 31474                                  	push	ax ; ?
 31475                                  	push	bx ; ?
 31476                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31477                                  		   	
 31478                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31479                                  	int	21h
 31480                                  
 31481                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31482                                  	mov	es,ax
 31483                                  
 31484                                  ; ------------------------------
 31485                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31486                                  ; ------------------------------
 31487                                  
 31488                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31489                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 31490                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31491                                  
 31492                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31493                                  
 31494                                  	mov     bx,es
 31495                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31496                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31497                                  	inc     bx
 31498                                  	mov     es,bx
 31499                                  		
 31500                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31501                                  um20:	
 31502                                  	mov	ax,es
 31503                                  
 31504                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31505                                  
 31506                                  	pop	es ; ?
 31507                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 31508                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 31509                                  	retn
 31510                                  
 31511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31512                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 31513                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31514                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31515                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31516                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31517                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31519                                  
 31520                                  hl_unlink:
 31521                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31522                                  
 31523                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 31524                                  	;
 31525                                  	;push	ds
 31526                                  	;push	cs
 31527                                  	;pop	ds
 31528                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 31529                                  	;pop	ds
 31530                                  
 31531                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 31532                                  
 31533                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31534                                  	int	21h
 31535                                  	retn
 31536                                  
 31537                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31538                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31539                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31540                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31541                                  
 31542                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 31543                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 31544                                  
 31545                                  ;   Modification log:
 31546                                  ;
 31547                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 31548                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 31549                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 31550                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 31551                                  
 31552                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 31553                                  
 31554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31555                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 31556                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31557                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 31558                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 31559                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 31560                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31561                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 31562                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31563                                  
 31564                                  UnHideUMBs:
 31565                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 31566                                  
 31567                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31568                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 31569                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 31570                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 31571                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 31572                                  ;    every command execution.
 31573                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31574                                  
 31575                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 31576                                  	;
 31577                                  	;push	ds
 31578                                  	;push	cs
 31579                                  	;pop	ds
 31580                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 31581                                  	;pop	ds	
 31582                                  
 31583                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 31584                                  
 31585                                  	or	al,al
 31586                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 31587                                  
 31588                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 31589                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 31590                                  	retn			; that.
 31591                                  uhu10:	
 31592                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 31593                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 31594                                  
 31595                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 31596                                  	;
 31597                                  	;push	es
 31598                                  	;push	cs
 31599                                  	;pop	es
 31600                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 31601                                  	;pop	ds	
 31602                                  
 31603                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 31604                                  
 31605                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 31606                                  
 31607                                  	pop	ax
 31608                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31609                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 31610                                  	retn
 31611                                  
 31612                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31613                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 31614                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31615                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 31616                                  ; EXIT:     None
 31617                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31618                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 31619                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31620                                  
 31621                                  he_unlink:
 31622                                  	xor	bh, bh
 31623                                  
 31624                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 31625                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 31626                                  
 31627                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31628                                  	int	21h
 31629                                  	retn
 31630                                  
 31631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31632                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31633                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31634                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31635                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 31636                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 31637                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31638                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31639                                  
 31640                                  FreeUMBs:
 31641                                  	push	ax
 31642                                  	push	es
 31643                                  
 31644                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31645                                  	jc	short fusX
 31646                                  
 31647                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31648                                  fus10:	
 31649                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31650                                  	jnz	short fus20
 31651                                  	call	freeMCB
 31652                                  fus20:	   
 31653                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31654                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31655                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 31656                                  
 31657                                  	mov	ax,es
 31658                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31659                                  	inc	ax
 31660                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31661                                  
 31662                                  	jmp	short fus10
 31663                                  fusX:	
 31664                                  	pop	es
 31665                                  	pop	ax
 31666                                  	retn
 31667                                  
 31668                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31669                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 31670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31671                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31672                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 31673                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31674                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31675                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31676                                  
 31677                                  isHideMCB:
 31678                                  	;push	ax
 31679                                  
 31680                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 31681                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 31682                                  
 31683                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 31684                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 31685                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31686                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31687                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31688                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 31689                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31690                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31691                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31692                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31693                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31694                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 31695                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31696                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31697                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31698                                  ihm_x:	
 31699                                  	;pop	ax
 31700                                  	retn
 31701                                  
 31702                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31703                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 31704                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31705                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31706                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 31707                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31708                                  ; USES:     AX
 31709                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31710                                  
 31711                                  freeMCB:
 31712                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31713                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 31714                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 31715                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 31716                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 31717                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 31718                                  	retn
 31719                                  
 31720                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31721                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31722                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31723                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31724                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31725                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31726                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31727                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31728                                  
 31729                                  HeadUmb:
 31730                                  	; 13/05/2019
 31731                                  
 31732                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31733                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 31734                                  	;push	es
 31735                                  	;push	bx ; *
 31736                                  
 31737                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31738                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31739                                  
 31740                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31741                                  	int	21h
 31742                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 31743                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 31744                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 31745                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 31746                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31747                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 31748                                  
 31749                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 31750                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 31751                                  xhu_e:	
 31752                                  	;stc
 31753                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 31754                                  xhu_x:	
 31755                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 31756                                  	;pop	es	
 31757                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 31758                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 31759                                  	retn
 31760                                  
 31761                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31762                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 31763                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31764                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31765                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 31766                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31767                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 31768                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31769                                  
 31770                                  linkumb:
 31771                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 31772                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 31773                                  
 31774                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 31775                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 31776                                  
 31777                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 31778                                  	mov	bx,1
 31779                                  	int	21h
 31780                                  lumbX:
 31781                                  	retn
 31782                                  
 31783                                  %endif
 31784                                  
 31785                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31786                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31787                                  
 31788                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31789                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31790                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31791                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31792                                  
 31793                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31794                                  ;
 31795                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31796                                  ;
 31797                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31798                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31799                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31800                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31801                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31802                                  ;
 31803                                  ;	Output : none
 31804                                  ;
 31805                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31806                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31807                                  ;
 31808                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31809                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31810                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31811                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31812                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31814                                  
 31815                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31816                                  InitDevLoad:
 31817                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31818                                  	; ds = cs
 31819 0000276B 803E[7D1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31820                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31821                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31822 00002770 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31823                                  
 31824                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31825                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31826                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31827                                  ;
 31828                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31829                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31830                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31831                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31832                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31833                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31834                                  ;
 31835                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31836                                  ;
 31837                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31838                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31839                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31840                                  ;	pushf
 31841                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31842                                  ;	popf
 31843                                  ;
 31844                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31845                                  ;
 31846                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31847                                  
 31848                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31849                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31850                                  InitForConv:
 31851                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31852                                  	; ds = cs
 31853 00002772 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31854                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31855 00002775 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31856 00002777 E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31857 0000277A E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31858 0000277D 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31859                                  					;  in low memory
 31860                                  InitForHi:
 31861                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31862                                  	; ds = cs
 31863                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31864                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31865                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31866 0000277F A1[731E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31867 00002782 8B16[6F1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31868 00002786 0316[711E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31869 0000278A EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31870                                  
 31871                                  InitForLo:
 31872                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31873                                  	; ds = cs
 31874                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31875 0000278C C606[7D1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31876                                  initforlo_x:
 31877                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31878                                  	; ds = cs
 31879                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31880                                  					;  we are loading low
 31881                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31882                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31883 00002791 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31884 00002794 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31885                                  idl1:
 31886 00002798 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31887                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31888                                  	; ds = cs
 31889                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31890                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31891                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31892                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31893 0000279B A3[621E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31894 0000279E 8916[641E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31895 000027A2 C706[661E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31896 000027A8 A3[681E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31897 000027AB C3                      	retn
 31898                                  
 31899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31900                                  ;
 31901                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31902                                  ;
 31903                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31904                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31905                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31906                                  ;		   current UMB
 31907                                  ;
 31908                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31909                                  
 31910                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31911                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31912                                  	; ds = cs
 31913                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31914                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31915                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31916 000027AC A1[711E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31917 000027AF 0306[6F1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31918 000027B3 2B06[731E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31919                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31920                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31921                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31922                                  	;stc
 31923                                  	;retn
 31924                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31925 000027B7 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31926 000027BA 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31927                                  spcinumb1:
 31928 000027BC 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31929                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31930                                  	; ds = cs
 31931 000027BD 3B06[601E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31932                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31933                                  spcinumb2:
 31934 000027C1 C3                      	retn
 31935                                  
 31936                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31937                                  ;
 31938                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31939                                  ;
 31940                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31941                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31942                                  ;
 31943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31944                                  
 31945                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31946                                  ;
 31947                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31948                                  ;	push	ds
 31949                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31950                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31951                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31952                                  ;	pop	ds
 31953                                  ;
 31954                                  ;	inc	ax
 31955                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31956                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31957                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31958                                  ;	retn
 31959                                  
 31960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31961                                  ;
 31962                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31963                                  ;
 31964                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31965                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31966                                  ;		 the device.
 31967                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31968                                  ;
 31969                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31970                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31971                                  ;	UMB.
 31972                                  ;
 31973                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31974                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31975                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31976                                  ;
 31977                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31978                                  
 31979                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31980                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31981                                  
 31982                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31983                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31984                                  	; ds = cs
 31985 000027C2 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31986 000027C5 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31987 000027C8 CD21                    	int	21h
 31988                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31989                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31990                                  
 31991 000027CA 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31992                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 31993                                  	; 09/09/2023
 31994 000027CC 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 31995                                  
 31996 000027CE 4B                      	dec	bx
 31997                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31998                                  	; ds = cs
 31999 000027CF 391E[601E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 32000                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 32001 000027D3 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 32002                                  
 32003 000027D5 43                      	inc	bx
 32004                                  
 32005 000027D6 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 32006 000027D9 CD21                    	int	21h
 32007 000027DB 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 32008                                  
 32009                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32010                                  	;dec	ax
 32011                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 32012                                  	;
 32013                                  PrepareMark:
 32014 000027DD 1E                      	push	ds
 32015 000027DE 48                      	dec	ax
 32016 000027DF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32017 000027E1 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32018 000027E7 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32019 000027ED 40                      	inc	ax
 32020 000027EE 1F                      	pop	ds
 32021                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32022                                  	; ds = cs
 32023                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32024                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32025                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32026                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 32027 000027EF 891E[711E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 32028 000027F3 A3[6F1E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32029 000027F6 A3[731E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32030                                  	;
 32031                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32032                                  	; cf=0
 32033                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 32034 000027F9 C3                      	retn
 32035                                  
 32036                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32037                                  %if 1
 32038                                  gufd_err:
 32039 000027FA 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
