 35719                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35720                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35721                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35722                                  ;
 35723                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35724                                  ;       None
 35725                                  ;
 35726                                  ;   NOTES
 35727                                  ;       None
 35728                                  ;
 35729                                  ;   HISTORY
 35730                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35731                                  ;
 35732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35733                                  
 35734                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35735                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35736                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35737                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35738                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35739                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35740                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35741                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35742                                          int     21h             ;
 35743                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35744                                  check_time:
 35745                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35746                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35747                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35748                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35749                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35750                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35751                                  show_time:
 35752                                          push    bx              ;
 35753                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35754                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35755                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35756                                          int     10h             ;
 35757                                          push    dx              ;
 35758                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35759                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35760                                          int     10h             ;
 35761                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35762                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35763                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35764                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35765                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35766                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35767                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35768                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35769                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35770                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35771                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35772                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35773                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35774                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35775                                          pop     dx
 35776                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35777                                          int     10h             ;
 35778                                          pop     bx              ;
 35779                                  input_key:
 35780                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35781                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35782                                          int     21h             ;
 35783                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35784                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35785                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35786                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35787                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35788                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35789                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35790                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35791                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35792                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35793                                  got_time:
 35794                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35795                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35796                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35797                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35798                                  got_key:
 35799                                          push    ax              ;
 35800                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35801                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35802                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35803                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35804                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35805                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35806                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35807                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35808                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35809                                          pop     bx   		;
 35810                                  
 35811                                  timeout_disabled:
 35812                                          pop     ax              ;
 35813                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35814                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35815                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35816                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35817                                  
 35818                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35819                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35820                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35821                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35822                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35823                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35824                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35825                                          jmp     short print1
 35826                                  not_up:
 35827                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35828                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35829                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35830                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35831                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35832                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35833                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35834                                  print1: 
 35835                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35836                                  print2: 
 35837                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35838                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35839                                  to_input_key:
 35840                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35841                                  not_down:
 35842                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35843                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35844                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35845                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35846                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35847                                          call    show_status     ;
 35848                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35849                                  not_f8:
 35850                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35851                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35852                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35853                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35854                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35855                                  
 35856                                  normal_key:
 35857                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35858                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35859                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35860                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35861                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35862                                          retn			;
 35863                                  not_backspace:
 35864                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35865                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35866                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35867                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35868                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35869                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35870                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35871                                          jmp	short print2
 35872                                  
 35873                                  select_done:
 35874                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35875                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35876                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35877                                  
 35878                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35879                                  
 35880                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35881                                  
 35882                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35883                                  ;
 35884                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35885                                  ;
 35886                                  ;   INPUT
 35887                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35888                                  ;
 35889                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35890                                  ;       None
 35891                                  ;
 35892                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35893                                  ;       None
 35894                                  ;
 35895                                  ;   NOTES
 35896                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35897                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35898                                  ;
 35899                                  ;   HISTORY
 35900                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35901                                  ;
 35902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35903                                  
 35904                                  disp_input:
 35905                                          push    ax
 35906                                          cmp     al,' '
 35907                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35908                                          mov     al,' '
 35909                                  disp_ok:
 35910                                          mov     dl,al
 35911                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35912                                          int     21h
 35913                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35914                                          call    print
 35915                                          pop     ax
 35916                                          retn
 35917                                  
 35918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35919                                  
 35920                                  disp_num:
 35921                                          push    bx
 35922                                          add     al,'0'
 35923                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35924                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35925                                          mov     cx,1
 35926                                          int     10h
 35927                                          pop     bx
 35928                                          retn
 35929                                  
 35930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35931                                  ;
 35932                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35933                                  ;
 35934                                  ;   INPUT
 35935                                  ;       None
 35936                                  ;
 35937                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35938                                  ;       None
 35939                                  ;
 35940                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35941                                  ;       None
 35942                                  ;
 35943                                  ;   NOTES
 35944                                  ;       None
 35945                                  ;
 35946                                  ;   HISTORY
 35947                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35948                                  ;
 35949                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35950                                  
 35951                                  show_status:
 35952                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35953                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35954                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35955                                          int     10h             ;
 35956                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35957                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35958                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35959                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35960                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35961                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35962                                          int     10h             ;
 35963                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35964                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35965                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35966                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35967                                  show_onoff: 
 35968                                          int     10h
 35969                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35970                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35971                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35972                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35973                                  
 35974                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35975                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35976                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35977                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35978                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35979                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35980                                          int     10h             ;
 35981                                  show_done:                      ;
 35982                                          pop     dx              ;
 35983                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35984                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35985                                          pop     bx              ;
 35986                                          retn			;
 35987                                  
 35988                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35989                                  
 35990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35991                                  ;
 35992                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35993                                  ;
 35994                                  ;   INPUT
 35995                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35996                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35997                                  ;
 35998                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35999                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36000                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36001                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36002                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36003                                  ;
 36004                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36005                                  ;       AX
 36006                                  ;
 36007                                  ;   NOTES
 36008                                  ;       None
 36009                                  ;
 36010                                  ;   HISTORY
 36011                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36012                                  ;
 36013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36014                                  
 36015                                  skip_token:
 36016                                          call    get_char
 36017                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36018                                          call    any_delim
 36019                                          jne	short skip_token
 36020                                  skip_check_eol:
 36021                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36022                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36023                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36024                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36025                                          clc
 36026                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36027                                  	retn
 36028                                  skip_token_eol:
 36029                                          stc
 36030                                  skip_token_done:
 36031                                          retn
 36032                                  
 36033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36034                                  ;
 36035                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36036                                  ;
 36037                                  ;   INPUT
 36038                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36039                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36040                                  ;
 36041                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36042                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36043                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36044                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36045                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36046                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36047                                  ;
 36048                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36049                                  ;       AX
 36050                                  ;
 36051                                  ;   NOTES
 36052                                  ;       None
 36053                                  ;
 36054                                  ;   HISTORY
 36055                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36058                                  
 36059                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36060                                          call    get_char        ;
 36061                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36062                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36063                                          call    delim           ;
 36064                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36065                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36066                                  
 36067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36068                                  ;
 36069                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36070                                  ;
 36071                                  ;   INPUT
 36072                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36073                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36074                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36075                                  ;
 36076                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36077                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36078                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36079                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36080                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36081                                  ;
 36082                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36083                                  ;       AX
 36084                                  ;
 36085                                  ;   NOTES
 36086                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36087                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36088                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36089                                  ;
 36090                                  ;   HISTORY
 36091                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36092                                  ;
 36093                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36094                                  
 36095                                  skip_opt_line:
 36096                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36097                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36098                                       
 36099                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36100                                  
 36101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36102                                  ;
 36103                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   INPUT
 36106                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36107                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36108                                  ;
 36109                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36110                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36111                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36112                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36113                                  ;
 36114                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36115                                  ;       AX
 36116                                  ;
 36117                                  ;   NOTES
 36118                                  ;       None
 36119                                  ;
 36120                                  ;   HISTORY
 36121                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36122                                  ;
 36123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36124                                  
 36125                                  skip_line:
 36126                                          call    get_char
 36127                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36128                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36129                                          jne	short skip_line
 36130                                  skip_line_done:
 36131                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36132                                          retn
 36133                                  
 36134                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36135                                  ;
 36136                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36137                                  ;
 36138                                  ;   INPUT
 36139                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36140                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36141                                  ;
 36142                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36143                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36144                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36145                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36146                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36147                                  ;
 36148                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36149                                  ;       AX
 36150                                  ;
 36151                                  ;   NOTES
 36152                                  ;       None
 36153                                  ;
 36154                                  ;   HISTORY
 36155                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36156                                  ;
 36157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36158                                  
 36159                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36160                                  
 36161                                  get_number:
 36162                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36163                                  num_loop:
 36164                                          call    get_char        ;
 36165                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36166                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36167                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36168                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36169                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36170                                          push    ax              ;
 36171                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36172                                          push    dx              ;
 36173                                          mul     bx              ;
 36174                                          pop     dx              ;
 36175                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36176                                          pop     ax              ;
 36177                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36178                                          cbw                     ;
 36179                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36180                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36181                                  
 36182                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36183                                  ;num_done:
 36184                                          ;retn
 36185                                  
 36186                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36187                                  ;
 36188                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36189                                  ;
 36190                                  ;   INPUT
 36191                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36192                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36193                                  ;
 36194                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36195                                  ;       AL == next character
 36196                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36197                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36198                                  ;
 36199                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36200                                  ;       AX
 36201                                  ;
 36202                                  ;   NOTES
 36203                                  ;       None
 36204                                  ;
 36205                                  ;   HISTORY
 36206                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36207                                  ;
 36208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36209                                  
 36210                                  get_char:
 36211                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36212                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36213                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36214                                  	es	
 36215                                  	lodsb
 36216                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36217                                          retn			;
 36218                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36219                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36220                                  nearby_ret:
 36221                                          retn
 36222                                  
 36223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36224                                  ;
 36225                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36226                                  ;
 36227                                  ;   INPUT
 36228                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36229                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36230                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36231                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36232                                  ;
 36233                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36234                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36235                                  ;
 36236                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36237                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36238                                  ;
 36239                                  ;   NOTES
 36240                                  ;       None
 36241                                  ;
 36242                                  ;   HISTORY
 36243                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36244                                  ;
 36245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36246                                  
 36247                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36248                                  query_user:
 36249                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36250                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36251                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36252                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36253                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36254                                  qu_1:
 36255                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36256                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36257                                          push    ax                      ;
 36258                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36259                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36260                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36261                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36262                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36263                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36264                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36265                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36266                                  query_all:
 36267                                  
 36268                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36269                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36270                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36271                                  
 36272                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36273                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36274                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36275                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36276                                  
 36277                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36278                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36279                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36280                                  find_match:                             ;
 36281                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36282                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36283                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36284                                          inc     di                      ;
 36285                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36286                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36287                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36288                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36289                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36290                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36291                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36292                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36293                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36294                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36295                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36296                                          inc     di                      ;
 36297                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36298                                          int     21h                     ;
 36299                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36300                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36301                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36302                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36303                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36304                                  cmd_notset:
 36305                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36306                                  line_print:                             ;
 36307                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36308                                          es
 36309                                  	lodsb
 36310                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36311                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36312                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36313                                  non_null:                               ;
 36314                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36315                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36316                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36317                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36318                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36319                                  non_space:                              ;
 36320                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36321                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36322                                          int     21h                     ;
 36323                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36324                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36325                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36326                                  
 36327                                  generic_prompt:
 36328                                          call    print                   ;
 36329                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36330                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36331                                          int     16h                     ;
 36332                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36333                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36334                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36335                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36336                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36337                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36338                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36339                                  not_func:
 36340                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36341                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36342                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36343                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36344                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36345                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36346                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36347                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36348                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36349                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36350                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36351                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36352                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36353                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36354                                  
 36355                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36356                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36357                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36358                                  	clc
 36359                                  do_cmd:
 36360                                  	pop     ax			;
 36361                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36362                                  	; cf=0
 36363                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36364                                  	retn
 36365                                  
 36366                                  skip_cmd:
 36367                                  	pop     ax			;
 36368                                  skip_all:
 36369                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36370                                  	stc
 36371                                  	retn
 36372                                  
 36373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36374                                  ;
 36375                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36376                                  ;
 36377                                  ;   INPUT
 36378                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36379                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36380                                  ;
 36381                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36382                                  ;       None
 36383                                  ;
 36384                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36385                                  ;       None
 36386                                  ;
 36387                                  ;   NOTES
 36388                                  ;       None
 36389                                  ;
 36390                                  ;   HISTORY
 36391                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36392                                  ;
 36393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36394                                  
 36395                                  print_error:
 36396                                          push    ax
 36397                                          push    bx
 36398                                          push    cx
 36399                                          push    dx
 36400                                          push    ds
 36401                                          push    cs
 36402                                          pop     ds
 36403                                          pushf
 36404                                          call    get_linenum
 36405                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36406                                          call    error_line
 36407                                          popf
 36408                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36409                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36410                                          call    print
 36411                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36412                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36413                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36414                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36415                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36416                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36417                                  pe_1:     
 36418                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36419                                          call    print
 36420                                  pe_ret: 
 36421                                  	pop     ds
 36422                                          pop     dx
 36423                                          pop     cx
 36424                                          pop     bx
 36425                                          pop     ax
 36426                                  	retn
 36427                                  
 36428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36429                                  
 36430                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36431                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36432                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36433                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36434                                  
 36435                                  disable_autoexec:
 36436                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36437                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36438                                  
 36439                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36440                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36441                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36442                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36443                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36444                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36445                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36446                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36447                                  dae_1:
 36448                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36449                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36450                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36451                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36452                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36453                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36454                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36455                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36456                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36457                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36458                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36459                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36460                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36461                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36462                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36463                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36464                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36465                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36466                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36467                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36468                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36469                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36470                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36471                                          retn
 36472                                  
 36473                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36474                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36475                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36476                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36477                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36478                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36479                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36480                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36481                                  
 36482                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36483                                  
 36484                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36485                                  
 36486                                  
 36487                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 36490                                  ;
 36491                                  ; procedure : delim
 36492                                  ;
 36493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36494                                  
 36495                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36496                                  ;
 36497                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36498                                  ;
 36499                                  ;any_delim:
 36500                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36501                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36502                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36503                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36504                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36505                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36506                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36507                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36508                                  ;
 36509                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36510                                  
 36511                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36512                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36513                                  delim:
 36514 00002FB9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36515 00002FBB 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36516                                  
 36517 00002FBD 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36518 00002FBF 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36519                                  
 36520                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36521 00002FC1 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36522 00002FC3 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36523 00002FC5 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36524 00002FC7 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36525 00002FC9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36526 00002FCB 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36527 00002FCD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36528 00002FCF 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36529 00002FD1 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36530                                  
 36531                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36532                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36533                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36534 00002FD3 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36535                                  ;endif
 36536                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36537                                  delim_ret:
 36538                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36539 00002FD4 C3                      	retn
 36540

 36604                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36605                                  
 36606                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36607                                  mapcase:
 36608 00002FF5 51                      	push	cx
 36609 00002FF6 56                      	push	si
 36610 00002FF7 1E                      	push	ds
 36611                                  
 36612 00002FF8 06                      	push	es
 36613 00002FF9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36614                                  
 36615                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36616                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36617                                  ;
 36618                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36619                                  ;;else
 36620                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36621                                  ;;endif
 36622                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36623 00002FFA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36624                                  
 36625                                  convloop:
 36626 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 36627 00002FFD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36628 00002FFF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36629 00003001 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36630 00003003 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36631 00003005 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36632 00003007 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36633                                  noconv:
 36634                                  
 36635                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36636                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36637                                  ;;
 36638                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36639                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36640                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36641                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36642                                  ;;
 36643                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36644                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36645                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36646                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36647                                  ;check_eol:
 36648                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36649                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36650                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36651                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36652                                  ;;endif
 36653                                  	
 36654                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36655 0000300A E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36656                                  convdone:
 36657 0000300C 1F                      	pop	ds
 36658 0000300D 5E                      	pop	si
 36659 0000300E 59                      	pop	cx
 36660 0000300F C3                      	retn

 36664                                  ; procedure : round
 36665                                  ;
 36666                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36667                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36668                                  ;
 36669                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36670                                  
 36671                                  round:
 36672                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36673 00003010 1E                      	push	ds
 36674 00003011 0E                      	push	cs
 36675 00003012 1F                      	pop	ds
 36676                                  
 36677 00003013 50                      	push	ax
 36678                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36679 00003014 A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 36680                                  
 36681 00003017 E88AE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36682                                  
 36683                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36684 0000301A 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 36685                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36686 0000301E C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 36687                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36688 00003024 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 36689                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36690 00003027 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 36691                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 36692                                  	; 17/09/2023
 36693 0000302B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 36694                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36695 0000302D F606[1014]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36696 00003032 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36697 00003034 06                      	push	es
 36698 00003035 56                      	push	si
 36699                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36700 00003036 8B36[0E14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 36701 0000303A 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36702 0000303C 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36703 0000303E 48                      	dec	ax
 36704                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36705 0000303F 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36706                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36707 00003043 8026[1014]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36708 00003048 5E                      	pop	si
 36709 00003049 07                      	pop	es
 36710                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36711 0000304A 58                      	pop	ax
 36712                                  
 36713                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36714 0000304B 1F                      	pop	ds
 36715                                  
 36716                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36717                                  	; cf = 0
 36718                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36719                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36720 0000304C C3                      	retn
 36721

 36778                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36779                                  ;
 36780                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36781                                  ;
 36782                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36783                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36784                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36785                                  ;
 36786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36787                                  
 36788                                  getnum:
 36789 00003083 53                      	push	bx
 36790 00003084 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36791                                  b2:
 36792 00003086 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36793 00003089 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36794                                  
 36795 0000308B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36796 0000308C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36797                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36798                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36799 0000308D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36800 0000308F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36801 00003091 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36802 00003092 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36803 00003094 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36804 00003097 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36805                                  
 36806 00003099 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36807                                  
 36808 0000309A E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36809 0000309D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36810 0000309F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36811 000030A1 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36812 000030A3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36813 000030A5 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36814 000030A7 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36815 000030A9 7417                    	je	short b15
 36816 000030AB 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36817 000030B0 7410                    	je	short b15
 36818 000030B2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36819                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36820                                  	;nop
 36821                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36822                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36823                                  	;nop
 36824                                  	;nop
 36825 000030B4 740C                    	je	short b15
 36826 000030B6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36827 000030B8 7408                    	je	short b15
 36828 000030BA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36829 000030BC 7404                    	je	short b15
 36830 000030BE 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36831 000030C0 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36832                                  b15:
 36833 000030C2 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36834 000030C7 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36835                                  b1:
 36836 000030CC 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36837 000030CE 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36838 000030D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 36839 000030D1 C3                      	retn
 36840                                  badnum:
 36841                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36842                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36843 000030D2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36844                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36845 000030D4 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36846 000030D8 5B                      	pop	bx
 36847 000030D9 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36848 000030DA C3                      	retn
 36849                                  
 36850                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36851                                  
 36852                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36853                                  
 36854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36855                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36856                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36857                                  ;	si = 0
 36858                                  ;	ax = country id
 36859                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36860                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36861                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36862                                  ;
 36863                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36864                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36865                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36866                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36867                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36868                                  
 36869                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36870                                  
 36871 000030DB 57                      	push	di
 36872 000030DC 50                      	push	ax
 36873 000030DD 52                      	push	dx
 36874                                  
 36875 000030DE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36876 000030E0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36877 000030E2 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36878 000030E5 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36879 000030E8 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 37178                                  
 37179                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37180                                  
 37181                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37182                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37183                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37184                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37185                                  ;
 37186                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37187                                  ;	 be moved.
 37188                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37189                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37190                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37191                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37192                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37193                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37195                                  
 37196 0000322B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37197 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37198 0000322F F9                      	stc
 37199 00003230 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37200 00003232 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37201 00003233 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37202                                  
 37203 00003235 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37204 00003237 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37205 00003239 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37206 0000323B F9                      	stc
 37207 0000323C CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37208                                  ricb_exit:
 37209 0000323E C3                      	retn

 37213                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37214                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023 (Retro DOS v4.2)
 37215                                  %if 0
 37216                                  
 37217                                  set_country_path:
 37218                                  
 37219                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37220                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37221                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37222                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37223                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37224                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37225                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37227                                  
 37228                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37229                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37230                                  
 37231                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37232                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37233                                  
 37234                                  	push	si
 37235                                  
 37236                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37237                                  	push	es
 37238                                  	pop	ds
 37239                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37240                                  
 37241                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37242                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37243                                  
 37244                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37245                                  	inc	si
 37246                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37247                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37248                                  
 37249                                  scp_default_drv:
 37250                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37251                                  	int	21h
 37252                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37253                                  
 37254                                  scp_setdrv:
 37255                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37256                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37257                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37258                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37259                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37260                                  
 37261                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37262                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37263                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37264                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37265                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37266                                  
 37267                                  scp_root_dir:
 37268                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37269                                  scp_path:
 37270                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37271                                  
 37272                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37273                                  scpath_exit:
 37274                                  
 37275                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37276                                  	push	es
 37277                                  	pop	ds
 37278                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37279                                  
 37280                                  	pop	si
 37281                                  	retn
 37282                                  
 37283                                  %endif
 37284
